atk-s0508a1:474_10: vijitattā vidhamitattā vijitāvī. Apetabheravoti pañcavīsatiyā bhayānaṃ sabbaso apetattā
atk-s0508a1:474_11: apagatabheravo abhayūparato. Puna dabboti nāmakittanaṃ. Parinibbutoti dve parinibbānāni
atk-s0508a1:474_12: kilesaparinibbānañca, yā saupādisesanibbānadhātu, khandhaparinibbānañca, yā anupādisesanibbānadhātu.
atk-s0508a1:474_13: Tesu idha kilesaparinibbānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā pahātabbadhammānaṃ maggena sabbaso
atk-s0508a1:474_14: pahīnattā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho. Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo acalo
atk-s0508a1:474_15: iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā lokadhammehi akampanīyo. Hīti ca hetuatthe nipāto, tena
atk-s0508a1:474_16: yo pubbe duddamo hutvā ṭhito yasmā dabbattā satthārā uttamena damena damito santusito
atk-s0508a1:474_17: vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetabheravo, tasmā so dabbo parinibbuto tatoyeva ca ṭhitatto,
atk-s0508a1:474_18: evaṃbhūte ca tasmiṃ cittapasādova kātabbo, na pasādaññathattanti paraneyyabuddhike
atk-s0508a1:477_0: Yo sītavananti āyasmato sambhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ito kira aṭṭhārasādhikassa
atk-s0508a1:477_1: kappasatassa matthake atthadassī nāma sambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsāramahoghato
atk-s0508a1:477_2: tārento ekadivasaṃ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagacchi. Tasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0508a1:477_3: ayaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:477_4: vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante, pāraṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi. Bhagavā “gamissāmā”ti avoca.
atk-s0508a1:477_5: So tāvadeva nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ yojetvā upanesi. Satthā taṃ anukampanto saha bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a1:477_6: nāvaṃ abhiruhi. So sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva paratīraṃ sampāpetvā bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0508a1:477_7: dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattetvā anugantvā pasannacitto vanditvā nivatti. So tena
atk-s0508a1:477_8: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaritvā ito terasādhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule
atk-s0508a1:477_9: nibbattitvā rājā ahosi cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā. So satte sugatimagge patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:477_10: tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhutadhamme samādāya
atk-s0508a1:477_11: susāne vasanto samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Puna kassapassa bhagavato kālepi tassa sāsane
atk-s0508a1:477_12: tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṃ pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:477_13: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:477_14: nibbatti. Tassa “sambhūto”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:477_15: gato. Bhūmijo jeyyaseno abhirādhanoti tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gato
atk-s0508a1:477_16: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:480_0: Atha sambhūto bhagavato santike kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nibaddhaṃ sītavane
atk-s0508a1:480_1: vasati. Tenevāyasmā “sītavaniyo”ti paññāyittha. Tena ca samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā
atk-s0508a1:480_2: kenacideva karaṇīyena jambudīpe dakkhiṇadisābhāgaṃ uddissa ākāsena gacchanto theraṃ
atk-s0508a1:480_3: abbhokāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontaṃ disvā vimānato oruyha theraṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a1:480_4: “yadā thero samādhito vuṭṭhahissati, tadā mama āgamanaṃ ārocetha, ārakkhañcassa karothā”ti
atk-s0508a1:480_5: dve yakkhe āṇāpetvā pakkāmi. Te therassa samīpe ṭhatvā manasikāraṃ paṭisaṃharitvā
atk-s0508a1:480_6: nisinnakāle ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā thero “tumhe mama vacanena vessavaṇamahārājassa kathetha,
atk-s0508a1:480_7: bhagavatā attano sāsane ṭhitānaṃ satiārakkhā nāma ṭhapitā atthi, sāyeva mādise rakkhati,
atk-s0508a1:480_8: tvaṃ tattha appossukko hohi, bhagavato ovāde ṭhitānaṃ edisāya ārakkhāya karaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:480_9: natthī”ti te vissajjetvā tāvadeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vijjāttayaṃ sacchākāsi. Tato
atk-s0508a1:480_10: vessavaṇo nivattamāno therassa samīpaṃ patvā mukhākārasallakkhaṇenevassa katakiccabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:480_11: ñatvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato ārocetvā satthu sammukhā theraṃ abhitthavanto –
atk-s0508a1:483: Imāya gāthāya therassa guṇe vaṇṇesi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:492: “Pacchime ca bhave asmiṃ, jātohaṃ brāhmaṇe kule;
atk-s0508a1:493: Saddhiṃ tīhi sahāyehi, pabbajiṃ satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a1:495_0: Athāyasmā sambhūto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gacchante bhikkhū disvā “āvuso, mama vacanena
atk-s0508a1:495_1: bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha, evañca vadethā”ti vatvā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ attano satthu
atk-s0508a1:495_2: aviheṭhitabhāvaṃ pakāsento “yo sītavana”nti gāthamāha. Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:495_3: vanditvā sambhūtattherassa sāsanaṃ sampavedentā, “āyasmā, bhante, sambhūto bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:495_4: pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadatī”ti vatvā taṃ gāthaṃ ārocesuṃ, taṃ sutvā bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:495_5: “paṇḍito, bhikkhave, sambhūto bhikkhu paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:495_6: viheṭheti. Vessavaṇena tassattho mayhaṃ ārocitā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a1:496_0: 6. Yaṃ pana te bhikkhū sambhūtattherena vuttaṃ “yo sītavana”nti gāthaṃ satthu nivedesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:496_1: Tattha sītavananti evaṃnāmakaṃ rājagahasamīpe mahantaṃ bheravasusānavanaṃ. Upagāti
atk-s0508a1:496_2: nivāsanavasena upagacchi. Etena bhagavatā anuññātaṃ pabbajitānurūpaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:496_3: dasseti. Bhikkhūti saṃsārabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhu. Ekoti adutiyo,
atk-s0508a1:496_4: etena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. Santusitoti santuṭṭho. Etena catupaccayasantosalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:496_5: ariyavaṃsaṃ dasseti. Samāhitattoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā samāhitacitto, etena
atk-s0508a1:496_6: cittavivekabhāvanāmukhena bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ dasseti. Vijitāvīti sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantena
atk-s0508a1:496_7: vijetabbaṃ kilesagaṇaṃ vijitvā ṭhito, etena upadhivivekaṃ dasseti. Bhayahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:496_8: apagatattā apetalomahaṃso, etena sammāpaṭipattiyā phalaṃ dasseti. Rakkhanti rakkhanto.
atk-s0508a1:496_9: Kāyagatāsatinti kāyārammaṇaṃ satiṃ, kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūhanavasena avissajjento.
atk-s0508a1:496_10: Dhitimāti dhīro, samāhitattaṃ vijitāvibhāvataṃ vā upādāya paṭipattidassanametaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:496_11: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – so bhikkhu vivekasukhānupekkhāya eko sītavanaṃ upāgami,
atk-s0508a1:496_12: upāgato ca lolabhāvābhāvato santuṭṭho dhitimā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento tathādhigataṃ
atk-s0508a1:496_13: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā āraddhavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā adhigatena aggamaggena samāhito
atk-s0508a1:496_14: vijitāvī ca hutvā katakiccatāya bhayahetūnaṃ sabbaso apagatattā apetalomahaṃso jātoti.
atk-s0508a1:499_0: Yopānudīti āyasmato bhalliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira ito ekatiṃse kappe
atk-s0508a1:499_1: anuppanne buddhe sumanassa nāma paccekabuddhassa pasannacitto phalāphalaṃ datvā sugatīsu
atk-s0508a1:499_2: eva saṃsaranto sikhissa sammāsambuddhassa kāle aruṇavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:499_3: “sikhissa bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ujita, ojitā nāma dve satthavāhaputtā
atk-s0508a1:499_4: paṭhamāhāraṃ adaṃsū”ti sutvā attano sahāyakena saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:499_5: vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā patthanaṃ akaṃsu – “ubhopi mayaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:499_6: bhante, anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa paṭhamāhāradāyakā bhaveyyāmā”ti. Te tattha
atk-s0508a1:499_7: tattha bhave puññakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā kassapassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:499_8: gopālakaseṭṭhissa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā. Bahūni vassāni bhikkhusaṅghaṃ khīrabhojanena
atk-s0508a1:499_9: upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kāle pokkharavatīnagare satthavāhassa puttā
atk-s0508a1:499_10: bhātaro hutvā nibbattā. Tesu jeṭṭho taphusso nāma, kaniṭṭho bhalliyo nāma, te pañcamattāni
atk-s0508a1:499_11: sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā vāṇijjāya gacchantā bhagavati paṭhamābhisambuddhe
atk-s0508a1:499_12: sattasattāhaṃ vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle
atk-s0508a1:499_13: viharante rājāyatanassa avidūre mahāmaggena atikkamanti, tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye samepi
atk-s0508a1:499_14: bhūmibhāge akaddamodake sakaṭāni nappavattiṃsu, “kiṃ nu, kho, kāraṇa”nti ca cintentānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:499_15: porāṇasālohitā devatā rukkhaviṭapantare attānaṃ dassentī āha – “mādisā, ayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:499_16: acirābhisambuddho sattasattāhaṃ anāhāro vimuttisukhāpaṭisaṃvedī idāni rājāyatanamūle
atk-s0508a1:499_17: nisinno, taṃ āhārena paṭimānetha, yadassa tumhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
atk-s0508a1:499_18: Taṃ sutvā te uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedentā, “āhārasampādanaṃ papañca”nti maññamānā
atk-s0508a1:499_19: manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca bhagavato datvā dvevācikasaraṇaṃ gantvā kesadhātuyo labhitvā
atk-s0508a1:499_20: agamaṃsu. Te hi paṭhamaṃ upāsakā ahesuṃ. Atha bhagavati bārāṇasiṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0508a1:499_21: pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahe viharante taphussabhalliyā rājagahaṃ upagatā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:499_22: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Tesu taphusso
atk-s0508a1:499_23: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya upāsakova ahosi. Bhalliyo pana pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:502: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:505: Athekadivasaṃ māro bhalliyattherassa bhiṃsāpanatthaṃ bhayānakaṃ rūpaṃ dassesi. So attano sabbabhayātikkamaṃ pakāsento “yopānudī”ti gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:506_0: 7. Tattha yopānudīti yo apānudi khipi pajahi viddhaṃsesi. Maccurājassāti maccu nāma
atk-s0508a1:506_1: maraṇaṃ khandhānaṃ bhedo, so eva ca sattānaṃ attano vase anuvattāpanato issaraṭṭhena
atk-s0508a1:506_2: rājāti maccurājā, tassa. Senanti jarārogādiṃ, sā hissa vasavattane aṅgabhāvato senā
atk-s0508a1:506_3: nāma, tena hesa mahatā nānāvidhena vipulena “mahāseno”ti vuccati. Yathāha – “na hi
atk-s0508a1:506_4: no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. Atha vā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena “maccū”ti idha
atk-s0508a1:506_5: devaputtamāro adhippeto, tassa ca sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kāmādayo senā. Tathā cāha –
atk-s0508a1:507: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
atk-s0508a1:508: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
atk-s0508a1:510: Sattamī vicikicchā te, māno makkho ca aṭṭhamī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a1:511_0: Naḷasetuṃva sudubbalaṃ mahoghoti sāravirahitato naḷasetusadisaṃ ativiya abalabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:511_1: suṭṭhu dubbalaṃ saṃkilesasenaṃ navalokuttaradhammānaṃ mahābalavabhāvato mahoghasadisena
atk-s0508a1:511_2: aggamaggena yo apānudi vijitāvī apetabheravo danto, so parinibbuto ṭhitattoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:511_3: Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ samaṇo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0508a1:514_0: Yo duddamiyoti āyasmato vīrattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:514_1: kappe vipassissa bhagavato vasanaāvāsaṃ paṭijaggi. Ekadivasañca sindhuvārapupphasadisāni
atk-s0508a1:514_2: nigguṇṭhipupphāni gahetvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:514_3: saṃsaranto ito pañcatiṃse kappe khattiyakule nibbattitvā mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi
atk-s0508a1:514_4: cakkavattī. So dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārento satte saggamagge patiṭṭhāpesi. Puna
atk-s0508a1:514_5: imasmiṃ kappe kassapassa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:514_6: dānaṃ dento saṅghassa khīrabhattaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ tattha tattha dānamayaṃ puññasambhāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:514_7: karonto itarañca nibbānatthaṃ sambharanto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:514_8: sāvatthinagare rañño pasenadissa amaccakule nibbatti, “vīro”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So
atk-s0508a1:514_9: vayappatto nāmānugatehi pattabalajavādiguṇehi samannāgato saṅgāmasūro hutvā mātāpitūhi
atk-s0508a1:514_10: nibandhavasena kārite dārapariggahe ekaṃyeva puttaṃ labhitvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:514_11: kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ disvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:522_0: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmentaṃ theraṃ purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0508a1:522_1: uppabbājetukāmā antarantarā nānānayehi palobhetuṃ parakkamantī ekadivasaṃ divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:522_2: gantvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṃ ārabhi. Athāyasmā vīro “maṃ palobhetukāmā sineruṃ
atk-s0508a1:522_3: makasapakkhavātena cāletukāmā viya yāva bālā vatāyaṃ itthī”ti tassā kiriyāya niratthakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:523_0: 8. Tattha yo duddamiyotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Idaṃ panettha yojanāmattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:523_1: yo pubbe adanta kilesatāya paccatthikehi vā saṅgamasīse dametuṃ jetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāyaduddamiyo,
atk-s0508a1:523_2: idāni pana uttamena damena danto catubbidhasammappamadhānavīriyasampattiyā vīro,
atk-s0508a1:523_3: vuttanayeneva santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetalomahaṃso vīro vīranāmako anavasesato
atk-s0508a1:523_4: kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto, tato eva ṭhitasabhāvo, na tādisānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi
atk-s0508a1:523_5: cālanīyoti. Taṃ sutvā sā itthī – “mayhaṃ sāmike evaṃ paṭipanne ko mayhaṃ gharāvāsena
atk-s0508a1:523_6: attho”ti saṃvegajātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā nacirasseva tevijjā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:526_0: Svāgatanti āyasmato pilindavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0508a1:526_1: haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:526_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0508a1:526_3: disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:526_4: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke nibbattitvā bhagavati parinibbute satthu thūpassa
atk-s0508a1:526_5: pūjaṃ katvā saṅghe ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tato cuto devamanussesu eva saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:526_6: anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saggaparāyaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:526_7: akāsi. So anuppanneyeva amhākaṃ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇagehe nibbatti. “Pilindo”tissa
atk-s0508a1:526_8: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Vacchoti pana gottaṃ. Tena so aparabhāge “pilindavaccho”ti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:526_9: Saṃsāre pana saṃvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṃ nāma
atk-s0508a1:526_10: vijjaṃ sādhetvā tāya vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggappatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a1:527_0: Atha yadā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ upagato, tato
atk-s0508a1:527_1: paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati, attano kiccaṃ na sādheti.
atk-s0508a1:527_2: So cintesi – “sutaṃ kho pana metaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā
atk-s0508a1:527_3: dharati, tattha cūḷagandhāravijjā na sampajjatī’ti, samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato
atk-s0508a1:527_4: paṭṭhāya nāyaṃ mama vijjā sampajjati, nissaṃsayaṃ samaṇo gotamo mahāgandhāravijjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_5: jānāti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṃ vijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0508a1:527_6: So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – “ahaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, tava santike ekaṃ vijjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_7: pariyāpuṇitukāmo, okāsaṃ me karohī”ti. Bhagavā “tena hi pabbajā”ti āha. So “vijjāya
atk-s0508a1:527_8: parikammaṃ pabbajjā”ti maññamāno pabbaji. Tassa bhagavā dhammaṃ kathetvā caritānukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_9: kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_10: pāpuṇi. Yā pana purimajātiyaṃ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā, taṃ kataññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_11: nissāya sañjātabahumānā sāyaṃ pātaṃ theraṃ payirupāsitvā gacchanti. Tasmā thero devatānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:527_12: piyamanāpatāya aggataṃ patto. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:533: Sumedho nāma nāmena, anumodittha so tadā.
atk-s0508a1:540: “Na te bījaṃ pavappanti, napi nīyanti naṅgalā;
atk-s0508a1:544: “Na maṃ mittā amittā vā, hiṃsanti sabbapāṇino;
atk-s0508a1:553_0: Tathā devatāhi ativiya piyāyitabbabhāvato imaṃ theraṃ bhagavā devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:553_1: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:553_2: yadidaṃ pilindavaccho”ti so ekadivasaṃ bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno attano guṇe paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:553_3: tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vijjānimittaṃ bhagavato santike āgamanaṃ pasaṃsanto “svāgataṃ
atk-s0508a1:554_0: 9. Tattha svāgatanti sundaraṃ āgamanaṃ, idaṃ mamāti sambandho. Atha vā svāgatanti
atk-s0508a1:554_1: suṭṭhu āgataṃ, mayāti vibhatti vipariṇāmetabbā. Nāpagatanti na apagataṃ hitābhivuddhito
atk-s0508a1:554_2: na apetaṃ. Nayidaṃ dumantitaṃ mamāti idaṃ mama duṭṭhu kathitaṃ, duṭṭhu vā vīmaṃsitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:554_3: na hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ bhagavato santike mamāgamanaṃ, yaṃ vā mayā tattha
atk-s0508a1:554_4: āgataṃ, taṃ svāgataṃ, svāgatattāyeva na durāgataṃ. Yaṃ “bhagavato santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:554_5: sutvā pabbajissāmī”ti mama mantitaṃ gaditaṃ kathitaṃ, cittena vā vīmaṃsitaṃ idampi
atk-s0508a1:554_6: na dummantinti. Idāni tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “saṃvibhattesū”tiādimāha. Saṃvibhattesūti
atk-s0508a1:554_7: pakārato vibhattesu. Dhammesūti ñeyyadhammesu samathadhammesu vā, nānātitthiyehi
atk-s0508a1:554_8: pakatiādivasena, sammāsambuddhehi dukkhādivasena saṃvibhajitvā vuttadhammesu. Yaṃ
atk-s0508a1:554_9: seṭṭhaṃ tadupāgaminti yaṃ tattha seṭṭhaṃ, taṃ catusaccadhammaṃ, tassa vā bodhakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:554_10: sāsanadhammaṃ upāgamiṃ, “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo”ti upagacchiṃ. Sammāsambuddhehi
atk-s0508a1:554_11: eva vā kusalādivasena khandhādivasena yathāsabhāvato saṃvibhattesu sabhāvadhammesu
atk-s0508a1:554_12: yaṃ tattha seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ, taṃ maggaphalanibbānadhammaṃ upāgamiṃ, attapaccakkhato
atk-s0508a1:554_13: upagacchiṃ sacchākāsiṃ, tasmā svāgataṃ mama na apagataṃ sumantitaṃ na dummantitanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:557_0: Vihari apekkhanti āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira vipassissa
atk-s0508a1:557_1: bhagavato kāle cakkavākayoniyaṃ nibbatto bhagavantaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:557_2: attano mukhatuṇḍakena sālapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:557_3: saṃsaranto ito sattarase kappe aṭṭhakkhattuṃ cakkavattī rājā ahosi. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0508a1:557_4: kappe kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:557_5: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare
atk-s0508a1:557_6: samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa jātadivase tasmiṃ gehe sabbā
atk-s0508a1:557_7: rittakumbhiyo suvaṇṇamāsānaṃ puṇṇā ahesuṃ. Tenassa puṇṇamāsoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:557_8: brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ patvā vivāhakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā upanissayasampannatāya
atk-s0508a1:557_9: gharāvāsaṃ jigucchanto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:557_11: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:563: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṃ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a1:571_0: Athassa purāṇadutiyikā taṃ palobhetukāmā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā puttena saddhiṃ upagantvā
atk-s0508a1:571_1: piyālāpabhāvādikehi bhāvavivaraṇakammaṃ nāma kātuṃ ārabhi. Thero tassā kāraṇaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:571_2: attano katthacipi alaggabhāvaṃ pakāsento “vihari apekkha”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:572_0: 10. Tattha viharīti visesato hari apahari apanesi. Apekkhanti taṇhaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:572_1: loke attabhāve vā. Huranti aparasmiṃ anāgate attabhāve vā. Idhāti vā ajjhattikesu
atk-s0508a1:572_2: āyatanesu. Huranti bāhiresu. Vā-saddo samuccayattho “apadā vā dvipadā vā”tiādīsu
atk-s0508a1:572_3: viya. Yoti attānameva paraṃ viya dasseti. Vedagūti vedena gato maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:572_5: abhisamecca ṭhito. Yatattoti maggasaṃvarena saṃyatasabhāvo, sammāvāyāmena vā saṃyatasabhāvo.
atk-s0508a1:572_6: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu ārammaṇesu dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepavasena na
atk-s0508a1:572_7: upalitto, tena lābhādilokadhamme samatikkamaṃ dasseti. Lokassāti upādānakkhandhapañcakassa.
atk-s0508a1:572_8: Tañhi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Jaññāti jānitvā. Udayabbayañcāti uppādañceva vayañca,
atk-s0508a1:572_9: etena yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. Ayaṃ panettha attho – yo sakalassa
atk-s0508a1:572_10: khandhādilokassa samapaññāsāya ākārehi udayabbayaṃ jānitvā vedagū yatatto katthaci
atk-s0508a1:572_11: anupalitto, so sabbattha apekkhaṃ vineyya santusito tādisānaṃ vippakārānaṃ na kiñci
atk-s0508a1:572_12: maññati, tasmā tvaṃ andhabāle yathāgatamaggeneva gacchāti. Atha sā itthī “ayaṃ samaṇo
atk-s0508a1:572_13: mayi putte ca nirapekkho, na sakkā imaṃ palobhetu”nti pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a1:578_0: Pāmojjabahuloti āyasmato cūḷavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:578_1: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā paresaṃ bhatiyā jīvikaṃ kappento bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:578_2: sāvakaṃ sujātaṃ nāma theraṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pariyesantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:578_3: vatthaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. So tena puññakammena tettiṃsakkhattuṃ devarajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:578_4: kāresi. Sattasattatikkhattuṃ cakkavattī rājā ahosi. Anekavāraṃ padesarājā. Evaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:578_5: saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:578_6: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussagatīsu aparāparaṃ parivattanto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:578_7: kosambiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Cūḷavacchotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu
atk-s0508a1:578_8: nipphattiṃ gato buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami, tassa bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:578_9: dhammaṃ kathesi. So paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado katapubbakicco caritānukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:578_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvento vihari. Tena ca samayena kosambikā bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā
atk-s0508a1:578_11: ahesuṃ. Tadā cūḷavacchatthero ubhayesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ laddhiṃ anādāya bhagavatā dinnovāde
atk-s0508a1:578_12: ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ brūhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:594_0: Atha cūḷavacchatthero arahattaṃ patvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahābhiratiyā sakatthavināsaṃ
atk-s0508a1:594_1: disvā dhammasaṃvegappatto, attano ca pattavisesaṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassavasena
atk-s0508a1:595_0: 11. Tattha pāmojjabahuloti suparisuddhasīlatāya vippaṭisārābhāvato adhikusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0508a1:595_1: abhirativasena pamodabahulo. Tenevāha “dhamme buddhappavedite”ti. Tattha dhammeti.
atk-s0508a1:595_2: Sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhamme navavidhe vā lokuttaradhamme. So hi sabbaññubuddhena
atk-s0508a1:595_3: sāmukkaṃsikāya desanāya pakāsitattā sātisayaṃ buddhappavedito nāma. Tassa pana adhigamūpāyabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:595_4: desanādhammopi idha labbhateva. Padaṃ santanti nibbānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Evarūpo
atk-s0508a1:595_5: hi bhikkhu santaṃ padaṃ santaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ upasamabhāvato saṅkhārūpasamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:595_6: paramasukhatāya sukhaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchati vindatiyeva. Parisuddhasīlo hi bhikkhu
atk-s0508a1:595_7: vippaṭisārābhāvena pāmojjabahulo saddhamme yuttappayutto vimuttipariyosānā sabbasampattiyo
atk-s0508a1:595_8: pāpuṇāti. Yathāha – “avippaṭisāratthāni kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlāni, avippaṭisāro
atk-s0508a1:595_9: pāmojjatthāyā”tiādi. Atha vā pāmojjabahuloti sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo,
atk-s0508a1:595_10: suppaṭipanno saṅghoti ratanattayaṃ sandhāya pamodabahulo. Tattha pana so pamodabahulo
atk-s0508a1:595_11: kiṃ vā karotīti āha “dhamme buddhappavedite”tiādi. Saddhāsampannassa hi sappurisasaṃsevanasaddhammassavanayonisomanasikāradhammānudhammapaṭipattīnaṃ
atk-s0508a1:595_12: sukheneva sambhavato sampattiyo hatthagatā eva honti, yathāha – “saddhājāto upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0508a1:598_0: Paññābalīti āyasmato mahāvacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:598_1: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pānīyadānamadāsi. Puna sikhissa bhagavato kāle upāsako
atk-s0508a1:598_2: hutvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ akāsi, so tehi puññakammehi tattha tattha
atk-s0508a1:598_3: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nāḷakagāme samiddhissa
atk-s0508a1:598_4: nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa mahāvacchoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:598_5: āyasmato sāriputtassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma mahāpañño. Yassa sāvakattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:598_6: upāgato, so eva maññe imasmiṃ loke aggapuggalo”ti bhagavati saddhaṃ uppādetvā satthu
atk-s0508a1:598_7: santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:607: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanena sabrahmacārīnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ “paññābalī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:608_0: 12. Tattha paññābalīti pārihāriyapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca vasena abhiṇhaso sātisayena
atk-s0508a1:608_1: paññābalena samannāgato. Sīlavatūpapannoti ukkaṃsagatena catupārisuddhisīlena, dhutadhammasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0508a1:608_2: vatehi ca upapanno samannāgato. Samāhitoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā samāhito.
atk-s0508a1:608_3: Jhānaratoti tato eva ārammaṇūpanijjhāne lakkhaṇūpanijjhāne ca rato satatābhiyutto.
atk-s0508a1:608_4: Sabbakālaṃ satiyā avippavāsavasena satimā. Yadatthiyanti atthato anapetaṃ atthiyaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:608_5: yena atthiyaṃ yadatthiyaṃ. Yathā paccaye paribhuñjantassa paribhuñjanaṃ atthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:608_6: hoti, tathā bhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno. Sāmiparibhogena hi taṃ atthiyaṃ hoti dāyajjaparibhogena
atk-s0508a1:608_7: vā, na aññathā bhojananti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhuñjiyati paribhuñjiyatīti
atk-s0508a1:608_8: vā bhojanaṃ, cattāro paccayā. “Yadatthika”nti vā pāṭho. Yadatthaṃ yassatthāya satthārā
atk-s0508a1:608_9: paccayā anuññātā, tadatthaṃ kāyassa ṭhitiādiatthaṃ, tañca anupādisesanibbānatthaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:608_10: Tasmā anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ bhojanapaccaye bhuñjamāno tato eva kaṅkhetha kālaṃ
atk-s0508a1:608_11: attano anupādāparinibbānakālaṃ āgameyya. Idha imasmiṃ sāsane vītarāgo. Bāhirakassa
atk-s0508a1:608_12: pana kāmesu vītarāgassa idaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:611_0: Nīlabbhavaṇṇāti āyasmato vanavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira atthadassino
atk-s0508a1:611_1: bhagavato kāle kacchapayoniyaṃ nibbatto vinatāya nāma nadiyā vasati. Tassa khuddakanāvappamāṇo
atk-s0508a1:611_2: attabhāvo ahosi. So kira ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ nadiyā tīre ṭhitaṃ disvā, “pāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:611_3: gantukāmo maññe bhagavā”ti attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā netukāmo pādamūle nipajji. Bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:611_4: tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā taṃ anukampanto āruhi. So pītisomanassajāto sotaṃ chindanto
atk-s0508a1:611_5: jiyāya vegena khittasaro viya tāvadeva paratīraṃ pāpesi. Bhagavā tassa puññassa phalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:611_6: etarahi nibbattanakasampattiñca byākaritvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:611_7: saṃsaranto anekasatakkhattuṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññavāsīyeva ahosi. Puna
atk-s0508a1:611_8: kassapabuddhakāle kapotayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā araññe viharantaṃ mettāvihāriṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a1:612_0: Tato pana cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:612_1: vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ puññakammaṃ upacini. Evaṃ tattha tattha devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0508a1:612_2: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare vacchagottassa nāma brāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:612_3: gaṇhi. Tassa mātā paripakkagabbhā araññaṃ dassanatthāya sañjātadohaḷā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a1:612_4: vicarati, tāvadevassā kammajavātā caliṃsu, tirokaraṇiṃ parikkhipitvā adaṃsu. Sā dhaññapuññalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:612_5: puttaṃ vijāyi. So bodhisattena saha paṃsukīḷikasahāyo ahosi. “Vaccho”tissa nāmañca
atk-s0508a1:612_6: ahosi. Vanābhiratiyā vasena vanavacchoti paññāyittha. Aparabhāge mahāsatte mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:612_7: nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahante, “ahampi siddhatthakumārena saha araññe viharissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:612_8: nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:612_9: bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasamāno nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:612_10: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:622: Sukhaṃ me tādisaṃ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a1:626: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a1:640_0: Evaṃ pana arahattaṃ patvā bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante tattha gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:640_1: vanditvā bhikkhūhi samāgato paṭisanthāravasena “kiṃ, āvuso, araññe phāsuvihāro laddho”ti
atk-s0508a1:640_2: puṭṭho “ramaṇīyā, āvuso, araññe pabbatā”ti attanā vuṭṭhapabbate vaṇṇento “nīlabbhavaṇṇā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:641_0: 13. Tattha nīlabbhavaṇṇāti nīlavalāhakanibhā nīlavalāhakasaṇṭhānā ca. Rucirāti ruciyā
atk-s0508a1:641_1: sakiraṇā pabhassarā ca. Sītavārīti sītalasalilā. Sucindharāti sucisuddhabhūmibhāgatāya
atk-s0508a1:641_2: suddhacittānaṃ vā ariyānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānatāya sucindharā. Gāthāsukhatthañhi sānunāsikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:641_4: attho. Indagopakasañchannāti indagopakanāmakehi pavāḷavaṇṇehi rattakimīhi sañchāditā
atk-s0508a1:641_5: pāvussakālavasena evamāha. Keci pana “indagopakanāmāni rattatiṇānī”ti vadanti. Apare
atk-s0508a1:641_6: “kaṇikārarukkhā”ti. Selāti silāmayā pabbatā, na paṃsupabbatāti attho. Tenāha – “yathāpi
atk-s0508a1:641_7: pabbato selo”ti. Ramayanti manti maṃ ramāpenti, mayhaṃ vivekābhirattiṃ paribrūhenti.
atk-s0508a1:641_8: Evaṃ thero attano cirakālaparibhāvitaṃ araññābhiratiṃ pavedento tividhaṃ vivekābhiratimeva
atk-s0508a1:641_9: dīpeti. Tattha upadhivivekena aññābyākaraṇaṃ dīpitameva hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:644_0: Upajjhāyoti sivakassa sāmaṇerassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhussa
atk-s0508a1:644_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṃ paviṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:644_2: tattha pabbatantare nisinnaṃ vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:644_3: vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Puna tattha manoharāni kāsumārikaphalāni disvā
atk-s0508a1:644_4: tāni gahetvā bhagavato upanesi, paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:644_5: devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane mātule pabbajante tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:644_6: pabbajitvā bahuṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vanavacchattherassa
atk-s0508a1:644_7: bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatto, sivakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Tassa mātā attano jeṭṭhabhātike
atk-s0508a1:644_8: vanavacche sāsane pabbajitvā pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā araññe viharante taṃ
atk-s0508a1:644_9: pavattiṃ sutvā puttaṃ āha – “tāta sivaka, therassa santike pabbajitvā theraṃ upaṭṭhaha,
atk-s0508a1:644_10: mahallako dāni thero”ti. So mātu ekavacaneneva ca pubbe katādhikāratāya ca mātulattherassa
atk-s0508a1:644_11: santikaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā taṃ upaṭṭhahanto araññe vasati.
atk-s0508a1:645_0: Tassa ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena gāmantaṃ gatassa kharo ābādho uppajji. Manussesu
atk-s0508a1:645_1: bhesajjaṃ karontesupi na paṭippassambhi. Tasmiṃ cirāyante thero “sāmaṇero cirāyati,
atk-s0508a1:645_2: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti tattha gantvā taṃ gilānaṃ disvā tassa taṃ taṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:645_3: karonto divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā rattibhāge balavapaccūsavelāyaṃ āha – “sivaka, na
atk-s0508a1:645_4: mayā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya gāme vasitapubbaṃ, ito araññameva gacchāmā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0508a1:645_5: sutvā sivako “yadipi me, bhante, idāni kāyo gāmante ṭhito, cittaṃ pana araññe, tasmā
atk-s0508a1:645_6: sayānopi araññameva gamissāmī”ti, taṃ sutvā thero taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā araññameva
atk-s0508a1:645_7: netvā ovādaṃ adāsi. So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:650: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:653: So arahattaṃ patvā upajjhāyena attanā ca vuttamatthaṃ saṃsanditvā attano vivekābhiratikataṃ katakiccatañca pavedento “upajjhāyo maṃ avacā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:654_0: 14. Tattha upajjhāyoti vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyati hitesitaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0508a1:654_1: pekkhatīti upajjhāyo. Manti attānaṃ vadati. Avacāti abhāsi. Ito gacchāma sīvakāti
atk-s0508a1:654_2: vuttākāradassanaṃ, sivaka, ito gāmantato araññaṭṭhānameva ehi gacchāma, tadeva amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:654_3: vasanayogganti adhippāyo. Evaṃ pana upajjhāyena vutto sivako bhadro assājānīyo viya
atk-s0508a1:654_4: kasābhihato sañjātasaṃvego hutvā araññameva gantukāmataṃ pavedento –
atk-s0508a1:655: “Gāme me vasati kāyo, araññaṃ me gataṃ mano;
atk-s0508a1:657_0: Tassattho – yasmā idāni yadipi me idaṃ sarīraṃ gāmante ṭhitaṃ, ajjhāsayo pana araññameva
atk-s0508a1:657_1: gato, tasmā semānakopi gacchāmi gelaññena ṭhānanisajjāgamanesu asamatthatāya sayānopi
atk-s0508a1:657_2: iminā sayitākārena sarīsapo viya sarīsapanto, etha, bhante, araññameva gacchāma,
atk-s0508a1:657_3: kasmā? Natthi saṅgo vijānatanti, yasmā dhammasabhāvā kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:657_4: nekkhamme nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa na katthaci saṅgo, tasmā ekapadeneva
atk-s0508a1:657_5: upajjhāyassa āṇā anuṭhitāti, tadapadesena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:660_0: Pañca chinde pañca jaheti āyasmato kuṇḍadhānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:660_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe uppanno vayappatto heṭṭhā
atk-s0508a1:660_2: vuttanayeneva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_3: salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā tadanurūpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_4: puññaṃ karonto vicari. So ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamāpattito
atk-s0508a1:660_5: vuṭṭhāya nisinnassa manosilācuṇṇapiñjaraṃ mahantaṃ kadaliphalakaṇṇikaṃ upanesi, taṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_6: bhagavā paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji. So tena puññakammena ekādasakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_7: kāresi. Catuvīsativāre rājā ahosi cakkavattī. Evaṃ so punappunaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_8: devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañca
atk-s0508a1:660_9: nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti. Tathā hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare
atk-s0508a1:660_10: chabbassantare uposatho ahosi. Kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:660_11: osāresi. Tassa pātimokkhassa osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_0: Ayaṃ bhummadevatā cintesi – “imesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ metti ativiya daḷhā, kiṃ nu
atk-s0508a1:661_1: kho, bhedake sati bhijjeyya, na bhijjeyyā”ti, sā tesaṃ okāsaṃ olokayamānā tesaṃ avidūreneva
atk-s0508a1:661_2: gacchati. Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_3: gantvā dhotahatthapādo hutvā gumbasamīpato nikkhamati bhummadevatā tassa therassa
atk-s0508a1:661_4: pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā saṃvidhāya sambandhantī viya piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_5: paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca hutvā therassa padānupadikā
atk-s0508a1:661_6: hutvā gumbato nikkhantā. Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva domanassajāto
atk-s0508a1:661_7: “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho, sacāhaṃ evaṃvidhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_8: jāneyyaṃ, ettakaṃ addhānaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti cintetvā āgacchantassevassa,
atk-s0508a1:661_9: “handāvuso, tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ, tādisena pāpena saddhiṃ ekamaggaṃ nāgacchāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:661_10: āha. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā viddhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_11: viya ahosi. Tato naṃ āha – “āvuso, kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadasi, ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkaṭamattampi
atk-s0508a1:661_12: āpattiṃ na jānāmi. Tvaṃ pana maṃ ajja ‘pāpo’ti vadasi, kiṃ te diṭṭha”nti. “Kiṃ aññena
atk-s0508a1:661_13: diṭṭhena, kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā
atk-s0508a1:661_14: nikkhanto”ti. “Natthetaṃ, āvuso, mayhaṃ, nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ passāmī”ti. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:661_15: yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:661_16: bhūtattaṃ katvā gaṇhanto tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:661_17: gato. Itaropi bhikkhu aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0508a1:662_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge
atk-s0508a1:662_1: sañjānitvā, “imasmiṃ uposathagge evarūpo nāma pāpabhikkhu atthi, nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:662_2: uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ mayā
atk-s0508a1:662_3: kammaṃ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, bhante, ayyo
atk-s0508a1:662_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito”ti āha. “Upāsaka, imaṃ uposathaggaṃ eko pāpabhikkhu paviṭṭho,
atk-s0508a1:662_5: ‘nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karomī’ti bahi ṭhitomhī”ti. “Bhante, mā evaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0508a1:662_6: parisuddhasīlo esa bhikkhu. Tumhehi diṭṭhamātugāmo nāma ahaṃ, mayā tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya
atk-s0508a1:662_7: ‘daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti, no daḷhā’ti bhijjanābhijjanabhāvaṃ olokentena
atk-s0508a1:662_8: taṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. “Ko pana, tvaṃ sappurisā”ti? “Ahaṃ ekā bhummadevatā, bhante”ti
atk-s0508a1:662_9: devaputto kathento dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādesu nipatitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a1:662_10: khamatha, etaṃ dosaṃ thero na jānāti, uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ
atk-s0508a1:662_11: pavesesi. So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi, mittasanthavavasena pana puna
atk-s0508a1:662_12: tena saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne ahosīti. Imassa therassa kammaṃ na kathīyati, cuditakatthero
atk-s0508a1:662_13: pana aparāparaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:663_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyabhayato na muccittha.
atk-s0508a1:663_1: Sace pana kismiñci kāle manussattaṃ āgacchati, aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva
atk-s0508a1:663_2: upari patati. So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. “Dhānamāṇavo”tissa
atk-s0508a1:663_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:663_4: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji, tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā
atk-s0508a1:663_5: itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva gāmaṃ pavisati, nikkhamante nikkhamati.
atk-s0508a1:663_6: Vihāraṃ pavisantepi saddhiṃ pavisati, tiṭṭhantepi tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ niccānubandhā paññāyati.
atk-s0508a1:663_7: Thero taṃ na passati. Tassa puna purimakammanissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Gāme
atk-s0508a1:663_8: yāguṃ bhikkhañca dadamānā itthiyo “bhante, ayaṃ eko yāguuḷuṅko tumhākaṃ, eko imissā
atk-s0508a1:663_9: amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti. Therassa mahatī vihesā hoti. Vihāragatampi
atk-s0508a1:663_10: naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharā bhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a1:663_11: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ. So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi
atk-s0508a1:663_12: kariyamānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā, tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0508a1:663_13: koṇḍo, ācariyo koṇḍo”ti vadati. Atha naṃ satthu ārocesuṃ “kuṇḍadhāno, bhante, daharasāmaṇerehi
atk-s0508a1:663_14: saddhiṃ evaṃ pharusavācaṃ vadatī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, dhāna,
atk-s0508a1:663_15: sāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ pharusavācaṃ vadasī”ti vatvā tena “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte “kasmā
atk-s0508a1:663_16: evaṃ vadesī”ti āha. “Bhante, nibaddhaṃ vihesaṃ asahanto evaṃ kathemī”ti. “Tvaṃ pubbe
atk-s0508a1:663_17: katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi, puna evarūpaṃ pharusaṃ māvadī bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0508a1:665: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0508a1:667: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a1:668_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:668_1: Rājā “gacchatha, bhaṇe, vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena therassa
atk-s0508a1:668_2: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:668_3: nisinno hoti, sāpi itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati. Rājā disvā “atthidaṃ
atk-s0508a1:668_4: kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0508a1:668_5: paviṭṭhā viya ahosi. Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃ tameva paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā sabbattha olokento
atk-s0508a1:668_6: adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo, therassa eko kammavipāko”ti saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa
atk-s0508a1:668_7: samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa kāraṇassa abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theraṃ
atk-s0508a1:668_8: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kacci, bhante, piṇḍakena na kilamathā”ti pucchi. Thero
atk-s0508a1:668_9: “vaṭṭati, mahārājā”ti āha. “Jānāmahaṃ, bhante, ayyassa kathaṃ, evarūpena parikkilesena
atk-s0508a1:668_10: saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma pasīdissanti, ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:668_11: natthi, ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi tumhe upaṭṭhahissāmi, tumhe yoniso manasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti
atk-s0508a1:668_12: nibaddhabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena
atk-s0508a1:668_13: ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tato paṭṭhāya sā itthī antaradhāyi.
atk-s0508a1:669_0: Tadā mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikakule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti
atk-s0508a1:669_1: uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare
atk-s0508a1:669_2: aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhantu, dasabalo imāya saññāya sve
atk-s0508a1:669_3: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha
atk-s0508a1:669_4: sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi. Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake
atk-s0508a1:669_5: vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya
atk-s0508a1:669_6: bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, mayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_7: ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissāma, puthujjanānaṃ adatvā ariyānaṃyeva salākaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:669_8: Thero bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi – “āvuso, satthā ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati, puthujjanā
atk-s0508a1:669_9: mā gaṇhantu, ariyāva salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti. Kuṇḍadhānatthero “āhara, āvuso salāka”nti
atk-s0508a1:669_10: paṭhamaṃyeva hatthaṃ pasāresi. Ānando “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti,
atk-s0508a1:669_11: ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi. Satthā “āharāpentassa
atk-s0508a1:669_12: salākaṃ dehī”ti āha. Thero cintesi – “sace kuṇḍadhānassa salākā dātuṃ na yuttā, atha
atk-s0508a1:669_13: satthā paṭibāheyya, bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti “kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:669_14: gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Kuṇḍadhāno tassa pure āgamanā eva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_15: samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso, ānanda, satthā maṃ jānāti, mādisaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_16: bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā nivāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_17: gaṇhi. Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:669_18: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Yasmā ayaṃ thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā sappāyāhāralābhena
atk-s0508a1:669_19: samāhitacitto vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto upanissayasampannatāya chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:678: “Ye ca santi samitāro, yakkhā imamhi pabbate;
atk-s0508a1:685: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:701_0: Evaṃbhūtassapi imassa therassa guṇe ajānantā ye puthujjanā bhikkhū tadā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:701_1: salākaggahaṇe “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti samacintesuṃ. Tesaṃ vimatividhamanatthaṃ thero
atk-s0508a1:701_2: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “pañca
atk-s0508a1:702_0: 15. Tattha pañca chindeti apāyūpapattinibbattanakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni
atk-s0508a1:702_1: pāde bandhanarajjukaṃ viya puriso satthena heṭṭhimamaggattayena chindeyya pajaheyya.
atk-s0508a1:702_3: gīvāya bandhanarajjukaṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya, chindeyya vāti attho. Pañca
atk-s0508a1:702_4: cuttari bhāvayeti tesaṃyeva uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni
atk-s0508a1:702_5: uttari anāgāmimaggādhigamato upari bhāveyya aggamaggādhigamavasena vaḍḍheyya. Pañcasaṅgātigoti
atk-s0508a1:702_6: evaṃbhūto pana pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pahānena pañcasaṅgātigo
atk-s0508a1:702_7: hutvā. Bhikkhu oghatiṇṇoti vuccatīti sabbathā bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhūti, kāmabhavadiṭṭhiavijjoghe
atk-s0508a1:702_8: taritvā tesaṃ pārabhūte nibbāne ṭhitoti ca vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0508a1:705_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato belaṭṭhasīsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira
atk-s0508a1:705_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:705_2: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto upanissayasampattiyā abhāvena
atk-s0508a1:705_3: visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pana bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:705_4: saṃsaranto ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto mātuluṅgaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:705_5: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatito
atk-s0508a1:705_6: sugatiṃ upagacchanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:705_7: abhisambodhiyā puretarameva uruvelakassapassa santike tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:705_9: saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:710: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:713_0: Evaṃ adhigatārahatto āyasmato dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa upajjhāyo ayaṃ thero ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:713_1: phalasamāpattito uṭṭhāya taṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ attano pubbayogañca
atk-s0508a1:713_2: paccavekkhitvā pītivegavasena “yathāpi bhaddo ājañño”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:714_0: 16. Tattha yathāpīti opammapaṭipādanatthe nipāto. Bhaddoti sundaro thāmabalasamatthajavaparakkamādisampanno.
atk-s0508a1:714_1: Ājaññoti ājānīyo jātimā kāraṇākāraṇānaṃ ājānanako. So tividho usabhājañño assājañño
atk-s0508a1:714_2: hatthājaññoti. Tesu usabhājañño idhādhippeto. So ca kho chekakasanakicce niyutto,
atk-s0508a1:714_3: tenāha “naṅgalāvattanī”ti. Naṅgalassa phālassa āvattanako, naṅgalaṃ ito cito ca āvattetvā
atk-s0508a1:714_4: khette kasanakoti attho. Naṅgalaṃ vā āvattayati etthāti naṅgalāvattaṃ, khette naṅgalapatho,
atk-s0508a1:714_5: tasmiṃ naṅgalāvattani. Gāthāsukhatthañhettha “vattanī”ti dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Sikhīti
atk-s0508a1:714_6: matthake avaṭṭhānato sikhāsadisatāya sikhā, siṅgaṃ. Tadassa atthīti sikhī. Apare
atk-s0508a1:714_7: pana “kakudhaṃ idha ‘sikhā’ti adhippeta”nti vadanti, ubhayathāpi padhānaṅgakittanametaṃ
atk-s0508a1:714_8: “sikhī”ti. Appakasirenāti appakilamathena. Rattindivāti rattiyo divā ca, evaṃ mamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:714_9: appakasirena gacchantīti yojanā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā “bhaddo usabhājānīyo kasane
atk-s0508a1:714_10: niyutto ghanatiṇamūlādikepi naṅgalapathe taṃ agaṇento appakasirena ito cito ca parivattento
atk-s0508a1:714_11: gacchati, yāva kasanatiṇānaṃ parissamaṃ dasseti, evaṃ mamaṃ rattindivāpi appakasireneva
atk-s0508a1:714_12: gacchanti atikkamantī”ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “sukhe laddhe nirāmise”ti. Yasmā kāmāmisalokāmisavaṭṭāmisehi
atk-s0508a1:714_13: asammissaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ laddhaṃ, tasmāti attho. Paccatte cetaṃ
atk-s0508a1:714_14: bhummavacanaṃ yathā “vanappagumbe” “tena vata re vattabbe”ti ca. Atha vā tato pabhuti
atk-s0508a1:714_15: rattindivā appakasirena gacchantīti vicāraṇāya āha – “sukhe laddhe nirāmise”ti, nirāmise
atk-s0508a1:714_16: sukhe laddhe sati tassa laddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:717_0: Middhī yadāti āyasmato dāsakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:717_1: anuppanne tathāgate ajitassa nāma paccekabuddhassa gandhamādanato manussapathaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0508a1:717_2: aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya carantassa manoramāni ambaphalāni adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:717_3: devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_4: bahuṃ puññaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ kusalakammappasuto hutvā sugatito sugatiṃ upagacchanto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_5: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatti. Dāsakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So anāthapiṇḍikena
atk-s0508a1:717_6: gahapatinā vihārapaṭijagganakamme ṭhapito sakkaccaṃ vihāraṃ paṭijagganto abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_7: buddhadassanena dhammassavanena ca paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. Keci pana bhaṇanti –
atk-s0508a1:717_8: “ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto aññataraṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ
atk-s0508a1:717_9: upaṭṭhahanto kiñci kammaṃ kārāpetukāmo theraṃ āṇāpesi. So tena kammena amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:717_10: kāle sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto vayappatto seṭṭhinā vihārapaṭijaggane
atk-s0508a1:717_11: ṭhapito vuttanayeneva paṭiladdhasaddho ahosi. Mahāseṭṭhi tassa sīlācāraṃ ajjhāsayañca
atk-s0508a1:717_12: ñatvā bhujissaṃ katvā ‘yathāsukhaṃ pabbajā’ti āha. Taṃ bhikkhū pabbājesu”nti. So
atk-s0508a1:717_13: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kusīto hīnavīriyo hutvā na kiñci vattapaṭivattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a1:717_14: kuto samaṇadhammaṃ, kevalaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā niddābahulo viharati. Dhammassavanakālepi
atk-s0508a1:717_15: ekaṃ koṇaṃ pavisitvā parisapariyante nisinno ghurughurupassāsī niddāyateva. Athassa
atk-s0508a1:717_16: bhagavā pubbūpanissayaṃ oloketvā saṃvegajananatthaṃ “middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso
atk-s0508a1:718_0: 17. Tattha middhīti thinamiddhābhibhūto, yañhi middhaṃ abhibhavati, taṃ thinampi
atk-s0508a1:718_1: abhibhavateva. Yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Mahagghasoti mahābhojano, āharahatthakaalaṃsāṭakatatthavaṭṭakakākamāsakabhuttavamitakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:718_2: aññataro viya. Niddāyitāti supanasīlo. Samparivattasāyīti samparivattakaṃ samparivattakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:718_3: nipajjitvā ubhayenapi seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyuttoti dasseti. Nivāpapuṭṭhoti
atk-s0508a1:718_4: kuṇḍakādinā sūkarabhattena puṭṭho bharito. Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno
atk-s0508a1:718_5: thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu samparivattetvā samparivattetvā
atk-s0508a1:718_6: sayateva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca nivāpapuṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:718_7: mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto niddāyanasīlo samparivattasāyī,
atk-s0508a1:718_8: tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasikātuṃ na sakkoti. Tesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:718_9: amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti, gabbhāvāsato na parimuccatevāti.
atk-s0508a1:718_10: Taṃ sutvā dāsakatthero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:723: “Ekanavute ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:726: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero imāya gāthāya maṃ bhagavā ovadi, “ayaṃ gāthā mayhaṃ aṅkusabhūtā”ti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi. Tayidaṃ therassa parivattāhāranayena aññābyākaraṇaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:729_0: Ahu buddhassa dāyādoti siṅgālakapituttherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:729_1: kappe sataraṃsiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā
atk-s0508a1:729_2: attano hatthagataṃ tālaphalaṃ adāsi. Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:729_3: puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:729_4: sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā pabbajitvā aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvesi. Puna imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:729_5: sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ katvā ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0508a1:729_6: tassa “siṅgālako”ti nāmaṃ akāsi. Tena naṃ siṅgālakapitāti voharanti. So aparabhāge
atk-s0508a1:729_7: gharabandhanaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbaji. Tassa bhagavā ajjhāsayaṃ olokento aṭṭhikasaññākammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:729_8: adāsi. So taṃ gahetvā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane, athassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:729_9: vane adhivatthā devatā ussāhajananatthaṃ “bhāvanāphalaṃ nacirasseva hatthagataṃ karissatī”ti
atk-s0508a1:729_10: imamatthaṃ aññāpadesena vibhāventī “ahu buddhassa dāyādo”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:730_0: 18. Tattha ahūti hoti, vattamānatthe hi idaṃ atītakālavacanaṃ. Buddhassāti sabbaññubuddhassa.
atk-s0508a1:730_1: Dāyādoti dhammadāyādo navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadāyassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a1:730_2: ādāyako gaṇhanako. Atha vā ahūti ahosi. Evaṃnāmassa buddhassa dāyādabhāve koci vibandho
atk-s0508a1:730_3: idāneva bhavissatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “maññehaṃ kāmarāgaṃ so, khippameva vahissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a1:730_4: Bhesakaḷāvaneti bhesakena nāma yakkhena labhitattā pariggahitattā, bhesakaḷānaṃ vā
atk-s0508a1:730_5: kaṭṭhādīnaṃ bahulatāya “bhesakaḷāvana”nti laddhanāme araññe. Tassa bhikkhuno buddhassa
atk-s0508a1:730_6: dāyādabhāve kāraṇaṃ vadanto “kevalaṃ aṭṭhisaññāya, apharī pathaviṃ ima”nti āha. Tattha
atk-s0508a1:730_7: kevalanti sakalaṃ anavasesaṃ. Aṭṭhisaññāyāti aṭṭhikabhāvanāya. Apharīti “aṭṭhī”ti
atk-s0508a1:730_8: adhimuccanavasena patthari. Pathavinti attabhāvapathaviṃ. Attabhāvo hi idha “pathavī”ti
atk-s0508a1:730_9: vutto “ko imaṃ pathaviṃ viccessatī”tiādīsu viya. Maññehanti maññe ahaṃ. “Maññāha”ntipi
atk-s0508a1:730_10: pāṭho. Soti so bhikkhu. Khippameva nacirasseva kāmarāgaṃ pahissati pajahissatīti
atk-s0508a1:730_11: maññe. Kasmā? Aṭṭhikasaññāya kāmarāgassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0508a1:730_12: yo ekasmiṃ padese laddhāya atthikasaññāya sakalaṃ attano sabbesaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ “aṭṭhī”tveva
atk-s0508a1:730_13: pharitvā ṭhito, so bhikkhu taṃ aṭṭhikajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanto nacireneva
atk-s0508a1:730_14: anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgaṃ, sabbaṃ vā kāmanaṭṭhena “kāmo”, rañjanaṭṭhena “rāgo”ti ca
atk-s0508a1:730_15: laddhanāmaṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggena pajahissatīti. Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā so thero “ayaṃ devatā
atk-s0508a1:730_16: mayhaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ evamāhā”ti appaṭivānavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:738: Arahattaṃ pana patvā tāya devatāya vuttavacanaṃ patimānento tameva gāthaṃ udānavasena abhāsi. Tadevassa therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:741_0: Udakañhi nayantīti āyasmato kulattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira thero pubbepi
atk-s0508a1:741_1: vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā adhikārasampanno vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_2: ākāse gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṃ dātukāmo aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0508a1:741_3: cittaṃ ñatvā otaritvā paṭiggaṇhi. So ativiya pasannacitto hutvā teneva saddhāpaṭilābhena
atk-s0508a1:741_4: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci, satthā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi – “imaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_5: purisaṃ pabbājehī”ti. So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto
atk-s0508a1:741_6: chapi buddhantarāni devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:741_7: nibbatti. Kulotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto sāsane laddhappasādo bhagavato santike
atk-s0508a1:741_8: pabbajitvā vikkhepabahulatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0508a1:741_9: pavisanto antarāmagge bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā udakavāhakaṃ katvā icchiticchitaṭṭhāne udakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_10: nente purise disvā taṃ sallakkhetvā gāmaṃ paviṭṭho aññataraṃ usukāraṃ usudaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_11: usuyante pakkhipitvā akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā ujuṃ karontaṃ disvā tampi sallakkhetvā
atk-s0508a1:741_12: gacchanto purato gantvā araneminābhiādike rathacakkāvayave tacchante tacchake disvā
atk-s0508a1:741_13: tampi sallakkhetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā katabhattakicco pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā divāvihāre
atk-s0508a1:741_14: nisinno attanā diṭṭhanimittāni upamābhāvena gahetvā attano cittadamane upanento “acetanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_15: udakampi manussā icchikicchitaṭṭhānaṃ nayanti tathā acetanaṃ vaṅkampi saradaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_16: upāyena namento ujuṃ karonti, tathā acetanaṃ kaṭṭhakaḷiṅgarādiṃ tacchakā nemiādivasena
atk-s0508a1:741_17: vaṅkaṃ ujuñca karonti. Atha kasmā ahaṃ sakacittaṃ ujuṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:741_18: paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:755: Evaṃ yāni nimittāni aṅkuse katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, tehi saddhiṃ attano cittadamanaṃ saṃsanditvā aññaṃ byākaronto “udakañhi nayanti nettikā”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:756_0: 19. Tattha udakaṃ hīti hi-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Nayantīti pathaviyā taṃ taṃ thalaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:756_1: khaṇitvā ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:756_2: nenti. Tathā te nentīti nettikā. Tejananti kaṇḍaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nettikā attano
atk-s0508a1:756_3: ruciyā icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ nayanti, usukārāpi tāpetvā tejanaṃ namayanti ujuṃ
atk-s0508a1:756_4: karonti. Namanavasena tacchakā nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ namayanti attano
atk-s0508a1:756_5: ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti. Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā subbatā yathāsamādinnena
atk-s0508a1:756_6: sīlādinā sundaravatā dhīrā sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ uppādentā attānaṃ damenti, arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:759_0: Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthīti āyasmato ajitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:759_1: kappe vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto kapitthaphalaṃ adāsi. Tato parampi
atk-s0508a1:759_2: taṃ taṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ kappe anuppanne eva amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a1:759_3: satthari sāvatthiyaṃ mahākosalarañño aggāsaniyassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:759_4: Tassa ajitoti nāmaṃ ahosi. Tasmiñca samaye sāvatthivāsī bāvarī nāma brāhmaṇo tīhi
atk-s0508a1:759_5: mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sāvatthito nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:759_6: pabbajitvā godhāvarītīre kapitthārāme vasati. Atha ajito tassa santike pabbajito
atk-s0508a1:759_7: atthakāmāya devatāya coditena bāvarinā satthu santikaṃ pesito tissametteyyādīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a1:759_8: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā manasāva pañhe pucchitvā tesu vissajjitesu pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:759_9: satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:765: Arahattaṃ pana patto sīhanādaṃ nadanto “maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:766_0: 20. Tattha maraṇeti maraṇanimittaṃ maraṇahetu. Meti mayhaṃ, bhayaṃ natthi ucchinnabhavamūlatāya
atk-s0508a1:766_1: parikkhīṇajātikattā. Anucchinnabhavamūlānañhi “kīdisī nu kho mayhaṃ āyatiṃ uppattī”ti
atk-s0508a1:766_2: maraṇato bhayaṃ bhaveyya. Nikantīti apekkhā taṇhā, sā natthi jīvite suparimadditasaṅkhāratāya
atk-s0508a1:766_3: upādānakkhandhānaṃ dukkhāsārakādibhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhahanato. Evaṃbhūto cāhaṃ sandehaṃ
atk-s0508a1:766_4: sarīraṃ, sakaṃ vā dehaṃ dehasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhabhāraṃ nikkhipissāmi chaḍḍessāmi, nikkhipanto
atk-s0508a1:766_5: ca “‘iminā sarīrakena sādhetabbaṃ sādhitaṃ, idāni taṃ ekaṃsena chaḍḍanīyamevā’ti
atk-s0508a1:766_6: paññāvepullappattiyā sampajāno sativepullappattiyā paṭissato nikkhipissāmī”ti. Imaṃ
atk-s0508a1:766_7: pana gāthaṃ vatvā thero jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadanantaraṃ parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0508a1:771_0: Nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmīti āyasmato nigrodhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a1:771_1: ito aṭṭhārase kappasate brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_2: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā gharabandhanaṃ pahāya araññāyatanaṃ pavisitvā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_3: sālavane paṇṇasālaṃ katvā tāpasapabbajaṃ pabbajitvā vanamūlaphalāhāro vasati. Tena
atk-s0508a1:771_4: samayena piyadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakassa lokassa dhammāmatavassena
atk-s0508a1:771_5: kilesasantāpaṃ nibbāpento ekadivasaṃ tāpase anukampāya taṃ sālavanaṃ pavisitvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_6: samāpanno. Tāpaso vanamūlaphalatthāya gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphitasāladaṇḍasākhāyo
atk-s0508a1:771_7: gahetvā sālamaṇḍapaṃ katvā taṃ sabbatthakameva sālapupphehi sañchādetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_8: vanditvā pītisomanassavaseneva āhāratthāyapi agantvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Satthā
atk-s0508a1:771_9: nirodhato vuṭṭhāya tassa anukampāya “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi, “bhikkhusaṅghepi
atk-s0508a1:771_10: cittaṃ pasādessatī”ti. Tāvadeva bhikkhusaṅgho āgato. So bhikkhusaṅghampi disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:771_11: vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Satthā sitassa pātukaraṇāpadesena tassa bhāviniṃ
atk-s0508a1:771_12: sampattiṃ pakāsento dhammaṃ kathetvā pakkāmi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:771_13: devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:771_14: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, nigrodhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So jetavanapaṭiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a1:771_15: buddhānubhāvadassanena sañjātappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:792: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a1:795: Tassa kammaṃ saritvāna, sitaṃ pātukariṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:797: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
atk-s0508a1:811: Gotamo nāma nāmena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:831: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:834: Evaṃ pana chaḷabhiñño hutvā phalasukhena vītināmento sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ aññābyākaraṇavasena “nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmī”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:835_0: 21. Tattha bhāyanti etasmāti bhayaṃ, jātijarādi. Bhayassāti nissakke sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:835_1: bhayato bhāyitabbanimittaṃ jātijarāmaraṇādinā hetunā nāhaṃ bhāyāmīti attho. Tattha
atk-s0508a1:835_2: kāraṇamāha “satthā no amatassa kovido”ti. Amhākaṃ satthā amate kusalo veneyyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:835_3: amatadāne cheko. Yattha bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhatīti yasmiṃ nibbāne yathāvuttaṃ bhayaṃ na
atk-s0508a1:835_4: tiṭṭhati okāsaṃ na labhati. Tenāti tato nibbānato. Vajantīti abhayaṭṭhānameva gacchanti.
atk-s0508a1:835_5: Nibbānañhi abhayaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Kena pana vajantīti āha “maggena vajanti bhikkhavo”ti,
atk-s0508a1:835_6: aṭṭhaṅgikena ariyamaggena satthu ovādakaraṇā bhikkhū saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanakāti
atk-s0508a1:835_7: attho. Yatthāti vā yaṃ nimittaṃ yassa ariyamaggassa adhigamahetu attānuvādādikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:835_8: pañcavīsatividhampi bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati, tena ariyena maggena
atk-s0508a1:835_9: vajanti abhayaṭṭhānaṃ satthu sāsane bhikkhū, tena maggena ahampi gato, tasmā nāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:838_0: Nīlāsugīvāti āyasmato cittakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarabuddhakālato
atk-s0508a1:838_1: paṭṭhāya vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:838_2: viññuttaṃ patto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a1:838_3: vanditvā “santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti satthari nibbāne ca adhimucci.
atk-s0508a1:838_4: So tena puññakammena tato cuto tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a1:838_5: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a1:838_6: putto hutvā nibbatti cittako nāma nāmena. So bhagavati rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane
atk-s0508a1:838_7: viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:838_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññāyatanaṃ pavisitvā bhāvanānuyutto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:838_9: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:848_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ upagato tattha bhikkhūhi “kiṃ,
atk-s0508a1:848_1: āvuso, araññe appamatto vihāsī”ti puṭṭho attano appamādavihāranivedanena aññaṃ byākaronto
atk-s0508a1:849_0: 22. Tattha nīlāsugīvāti nīlasugīvā, gāthāsukhatthañhettha dīgho kato, rājivantatāya
atk-s0508a1:849_1: sundarāya gīvāya samannāgatoti attho. Te yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇatāya nīlā. Sobhanakaṇṭhatāya
atk-s0508a1:849_2: sugīvā. Sikhinoti matthake jātāya sikhāya sassirikabhāvena sikhino. Morāti mayūrā.
atk-s0508a1:849_3: Kārambhiyanti kārambarukkhe. Kārambhiyanti vā tassa vanassa nāmaṃ. Tasmā kārambhiyanti
atk-s0508a1:849_4: kārambhanāmake vaneti attho. Abhinadantīti pāvussakāle meghagajjitaṃ sutvā kekāsaddaṃ
atk-s0508a1:849_5: karontā utusampadāsiddhena sarena haṃsādike abhibhavantā viya nadanti. Teti te morā.
atk-s0508a1:849_6: Sītavātakīḷitāti sītena meghavātena sañjātakīḷitā madhuravassitaṃ vassantā. Suttanti
atk-s0508a1:849_8: supantaṃ. Jhāyanti samathavipassanājhānehi jhāyanasīlaṃ bhāvanānuyuttaṃ. Nibodhentīti
atk-s0508a1:849_9: pabodhenti. “Imepi nāma niddaṃ anupagantvā jāgarantā attanā kattabbaṃ karonti, kimaṅgaṃ
atk-s0508a1:849_10: panāha”nti evaṃ sampajaññuppādanena sayanato vuṭṭhāpentīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:852_0: Ahaṃ kho veḷugumbasminti āyasmato gosālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:852_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a1:852_2: aññatarasmiṃ pabbate rukkhasākhāyaṃ olambamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:852_3: disvā “arahaddhajo vatāya”nti pasannacitto pupphehi pūjehi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:852_4: tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto. Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:852_5: magadharaṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto gosālo nāma nāmena. Soṇena pana koṭikaṇṇena kataparicayattā
atk-s0508a1:852_6: tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma mahāvibhavo pabbajissati, kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti
atk-s0508a1:852_7: sañjātasaṃvego bhagavato santike pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sappāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:852_8: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gavesanto attano jātagāmassa avidūre ekasmiṃ sānupabbate vihāsi. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:852_9: mātā divase divase bhikkhaṃ deti. Athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa mātā madhusakkharābhisaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0508a1:852_10: pāyāsaṃ adāsi. So taṃ gahetvā tassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṃ aññatarassa veḷugumbassa
atk-s0508a1:852_11: mūle nisīditvā paribhuñjitvā dhovitapattapāṇī vipassanaṃ ārabhi. Bhojanasappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a1:852_12: kāyacittānaṃ kallatāya samāhito udayabbayañāṇādike tikkhe sūre vahante appakasireneva
atk-s0508a1:852_13: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā bhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpento saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0508a1:862: Arahattaṃ pana adhigantvā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ pabbatasānumeva gantukāmo attano paṭipattiṃ pavedento “ahaṃ kho veḷugumbasmi”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:863_0: 23. Tattha veḷugumbasminti veḷugacchassa samīpe, tassa chāyāyaṃ. Bhutvāna madhupāyasanti
atk-s0508a1:863_1: madhupasittapāyāsaṃ bhuñjitvā. Padakkhiṇanti padakkhiṇaggāhena, satthu ovādassa sammā
atk-s0508a1:863_2: sampaṭicchanenāti attho. Sammasanto khandhānaṃ udayabbayanti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:863_3: udayabbayañca vipassanto, yadipi idāni katakicco, phalasamāpattiṃ pana samāpajjituṃ
atk-s0508a1:863_4: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentoti adhippāyo. Sānuṃ paṭigamissāmīti pubbe mayā vutthapabbatasānumeva
atk-s0508a1:863_6: paribrūhayanto, tassa vā paribrūhanahetu gamissāmīti. Evaṃ pana vatvā thero tattheva
atk-s0508a1:863_7: gato, ayameva ca imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosi.
atk-s0508a1:866_0: Anuvassiko pabbajitoti āyasmato sugandhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ito
atk-s0508a1:866_1: dvānavute kappe tissassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa kāle manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_2: patto migabyadhanena araññe vicarati. Satthā tassa anukampāya padavaḷañjaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a1:866_3: gato. So satthu padacetiyāni disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya “sadevake loke
atk-s0508a1:866_4: aggapuggalassa imāni padānī”ti pītisomanassajāto koraṇḍakapupphāni gahetvā pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_5: katvā cittaṃ pasādesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_6: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kuṭumbiko hutvā
atk-s0508a1:866_7: satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā gandhakuṭiṃ mahagghagositacandanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_8: pisitvā tena paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi – “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_9: sarīraṃ evaṃsugandhaṃ hotū”ti. Evaṃ aññānipi tattha tattha bhave bahūni puññakammāni
atk-s0508a1:866_10: katvā sugatīsu eva parivattamāno imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a1:866_11: brāhmaṇassa gehe nibbatti. Nibbattassa ca tassa mātukucchigatakālato paṭṭhāya mātu
atk-s0508a1:866_12: sarīraṃ sakalampi gehaṃ surabhigandhaṃ vāyati. Jātadivase pana visesato paramasugandhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:866_13: sāmantagehesupi vāyateva. Tassa mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:866_14: āgato”ti sugandhotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So anupubbena vayappatto mahāselattheraṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:866_15: tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sattāhabbhantare
atk-s0508a1:866_16: eva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:868: Pasumārena jīvāmi, kusalaṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:872: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, pade cittaṃ pasādayiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:882: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto “anuvassiko pabbajito”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:883_0: 24. Tattha anuvassikoti anugato upagato vassaṃ anuvasso, anuvassova anuvassiko. Pabbajitoti
atk-s0508a1:883_1: pabbajjaṃ upagato, pabbajito hutvā upagatavassamatto ekavassikoti attho. Atha vā
atk-s0508a1:883_2: anugataṃ pacchāgataṃ apagataṃ vassaṃ anuvassaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti anuvassiko. Yassa
atk-s0508a1:883_3: pabbajitassa vassaṃ aparipuṇṇatāya na gaṇanūpagataṃ, so evaṃ vutto, tasmā avassikoti
atk-s0508a1:883_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Passa dhammasudhammatanti tava satthu dhammassa sudhammabhāvaṃ svākkhātataṃ
atk-s0508a1:883_5: ekantaniyyānikataṃ passa, yattha anuvassiko tuvaṃ pabbajito. Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:883_6: āsavakkhayañāṇanti tisso vijjā tayā anuppattā sacchikatā, tato eva kataṃ buddhassa
atk-s0508a1:883_7: sāsanaṃ sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādo anusikkhitoti katakiccataṃ nissāya
atk-s0508a1:883_8: pītisomanassajāto thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā vadatīti.
atk-s0508a1:886_0: Obhāsajātanti āyasmato nandiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:886_1: bhagavato kāle satthari parinibbute cetiye candanasārena vedikaṃ kāretvā uḷāraṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:886_2: pavattesi. Tato paṭṭhāya ajjhāsayasampanno hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:886_3: bahuṃ puññakammaṃ ācinitvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:886_4: kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbatti. Tassa mātāpitaro nandiṃ janento jātoti nandiyoti
atk-s0508a1:886_5: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto anuruddhādīsu satthu santike pabbajantesu sayampi pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:886_6: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto katādhikāratāya nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:894: Omattaṃ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:898_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā anuruddhattherādīhi saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye viharante imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:898_1: there ekadivasaṃ māro pāpimā bhiṃsāpetukāmo tassa bheravarūpaṃ dasseti. Thero taṃ
atk-s0508a1:898_2: “māro aya”nti ñatvā “pāpima, ye māradheyyaṃ vītivattā, tesaṃ tava kiriyā kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0508a1:898_3: tatonidānaṃ pana tvaṃ eva vighātaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇissasī”ti dassento “obhāsajātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:899_0: 25. Tattha obhāsajātanti ñāṇobhāsena jātobhāsaṃ aggamaggañāṇassa adhigatattā. Tena
atk-s0508a1:899_1: anavasesato kilesandhakārassa vihataviddhaṃsitabhāvato ativiya pabhassaranti attho.
atk-s0508a1:899_2: Phalaganti phalaṃ gataṃ upagataṃ, aggaphalañāṇasahitanti adhippāyo. Cittanti khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0508a1:899_3: cittaṃ sāmaññena vadati. Tenāha “abhiṇhaso”ti. Tañhi nirodhaninnatāya khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:899_5: Tādisanti tathārūpaṃ, arahantanti attho. Āsajjāti visodhetvā paribhuyya. Kaṇhāti
atk-s0508a1:899_6: māraṃ ālapati, so hi kaṇhakammattā kaṇhābhijātitāya ca “kaṇho”ti vuccati. Dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:899_7: nigacchasīti idha kucchianuppavesādinā niratthakaṃ kāyaparissamaṃ dukkhaṃ, samparāye
atk-s0508a1:899_8: ca appatikāraṃ apāyadukkhaṃ upagamissasi pāpuṇissasi. Taṃ sutvā māro “jānāti maṃ
atk-s0508a1:902_0: Sutvā subhāsitaṃ vācanti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:902_1: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhammakathiko hutvā dhammakathanakāle paṭhamaṃ catūhi
atk-s0508a1:902_2: gāthāhi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā pacchā dhammaṃ kathesi. Tenassa puññakammabalena
atk-s0508a1:902_3: kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ apāyapaṭisandhi nāma nāhosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0508a1:904: Na gacchi kappāni apāyabhūmiṃ, satasahassāni uḷārasaddho”ti.
atk-s0508a1:905_0: Khettasampattiyādīhi tassa ca pubbapacchimasanniṭṭhānacetanānaṃ ativiya uḷārabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:905_1: so aparimeyyo puññābhisando kusalābhisando tādiso ahosi. “Acintiye pasannānaṃ, vipāko
atk-s0508a1:905_2: hoti acintiyo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha hi bhave upacitaṃ puññaṃ tassa upatthambhakamahosi.
atk-s0508a1:905_3: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato ketakapupphehi pūjamakāsi. Evaṃ uḷārehi puññavisesehi
atk-s0508a1:905_4: sugatīsu eva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rañño bimbisārassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a1:905_5: Abhayotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Tassa uppatti parato āvi bhavissati. So nigaṇṭhena nāṭaputtena
atk-s0508a1:905_6: ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ sikkhāpetvā “imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:905_7: āropehī”ti vissajjito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā tassa pañhassa
atk-s0508a1:905_8: anekaṃsabyākaraṇabhāve bhagavatā kathite nigaṇṭhānaṃ parājayaṃ, satthu ca sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:905_9: viditvā upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. Tato raññe bimbisāre kālaṅkate sañjātasaṃvego sāsane
atk-s0508a1:905_10: pabbajitvā tālacchiggaḷūpamasuttadesanāya sotāpanno hutvā puna vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0508a1:913: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanena aññaṃ byākaronto “sutvā subhāsitaṃ vāca”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:914_0: 26. Tattha sutvāti sotaṃ odahitvā, sotadvārānusārena upadhāretvā. Subhāsitanti suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a1:914_1: bhāsitaṃ, sammadeva bhāsitaṃ, sammāsambuddhabhāvato mahākāruṇikatāya ca kiñci avisaṃvādetvā
atk-s0508a1:914_2: yathādhippetassa atthassa ekantato sādhanavasena bhāsitaṃ catusaccavibhāvanīyadhammakathaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:914_3: Na hi saccavinimuttā bhagavato dhammadesanā atthi. Buddhassāti sabbaññubuddhassa.
atk-s0508a1:914_4: Ādiccabandhunoti ādiccavaṃse sambhūtattā ādicco bandhu etassāti ādiccabandhu, bhagavā.
atk-s0508a1:914_5: Tassa ādiccabandhuno. Ādiccassa vā bandhūti ādiccabandhu, bhagavā. Tassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:915: “Yo andhakāre tamasī pabhaṅkaro, verocano maṇḍalī uggatejo;
atk-s0508a1:916: Mā rāhu gilī caramantalikkhe, pajaṃ mamaṃ rāhu pamuñca sūriya”nti. ;
atk-s0508a1:917_0: Paccabyadhinti paṭivijjhiṃ. Hī-ti nipātamattaṃ. Nipuṇanti saṇhaṃ paramasukhumaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:917_1: nirodhasaccaṃ, catusaccameva vā. Hī-ti vā hetuatthe nipāto. Yasmā paccabyadhiṃ nipuṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:917_2: catusaccaṃ, tasmā na dāni kiñci paṭivijjhitabbaṃ atthīti attho. Yathā kiṃ paṭivijjhīti
atk-s0508a1:917_3: āha “vālaggaṃ usunā yathā”ti. Yathā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiṃ susikkhito kusalo
atk-s0508a1:917_4: issāso usunā kaṇḍena avirajjhanto vijjheyya, evaṃ paccabyadhiṃ nipuṇaṃ ariyasaccanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a1:920_0: Dabbaṃ kusanti āyasmato lomasakaṅgiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira ito ekanavute
atk-s0508a1:920_1: kappe vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso nānāpupphehi pūjetvā tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:920_2: devaloke nibbatto puna aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa
atk-s0508a1:920_3: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tena ca samayena satthārā bhaddekarattapaṭipadāya
atk-s0508a1:920_4: kathitāya aññataro bhikkhu bhaddekarattasuttavasena tena sākacchaṃ karoti. So taṃ
atk-s0508a1:920_5: na sampāyāsi. Asampāyanto “ahaṃ anāgate tuyhaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ kathetuṃ samattho bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a1:920_6: paṇidhānaṃ akāsi, itaro “puccheyya”nti. Etesu paṭhamo ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:920_7: saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0508a1:920_8: sukhumālabhāvena soṇassa viya pādatalesu lomāni jātāni, tenassa lomasakaṅgiyoti nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:920_9: ahosi. Itaro devaloke nibbattitvā candanoti paññāyittha. Lomasakaṅgiyo anuruddhādīsu
atk-s0508a1:920_10: sakyakumāresu pabbajantesu pabbajituṃ na icchi. Atha naṃ saṃvejetuṃ candano devaputto
atk-s0508a1:920_11: upasaṅkamitvā bhaddekarattaṃ pucchi. Itaro “na jānāmī”ti. Puna devaputto “atha kasmā
atk-s0508a1:920_12: tayā ‘bhaddekarattaṃ katheyya’nti saṅgaro kato, idāni pana nāmamattampi na jānāsī”ti
atk-s0508a1:920_13: codesi. Itaro tena saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “mayā kira, bhante, pubbe ‘imassa
atk-s0508a1:920_14: bhaddekarattaṃ kathessāmī’ti saṅgaro kato”ti pucchi. Bhagavā “āma, kulaputta, kassapassa
atk-s0508a1:920_15: bhagavato kāle tayā evaṃ kata”nti āha. Svāyamattho uparipaṇṇāsake āgatanayena vitthārato
atk-s0508a1:920_16: veditabbo. Atha lomasakaṅgiyo “tena hi, bhante, pabbājetha ma”nti āha. Bhagavā “na,
atk-s0508a1:920_17: kho, tathāgatā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti paṭikkhipi. So mātu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:920_18: gantvā “anujānāhi maṃ, amma, pabbajituṃ, pabbajissāmaha”nti vatvā, mātarā “tāta,
atk-s0508a1:920_19: sukhumālo tvaṃ kathaṃ pabbajissasī”ti vutte, “attano parissayasahanabhāvaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0508a1:921_0: 27. Tattha dabbanti dabbatiṇamāha, yaṃ “saddulo”tipi vuccati. Kusanti kusatiṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:921_1: yo “kāso”ti vuccati. Poṭakilanti sakaṇṭakaṃ akaṇṭakañca gacchaṃ. Idha pana sakaṇṭakameva
atk-s0508a1:921_2: adhippetaṃ. Usīrādīni suviññeyyāni. Dabbādīni tiṇāni bīraṇatiṇāni pādehi akkantassāpi
atk-s0508a1:921_3: dukkhajanakāni gamanantarāyakarāni ca, tāni ca panāhaṃ urasā panudissāmi urasāpi
atk-s0508a1:921_4: apanessāmi. Evaṃ apanento taṃ nimittaṃ dukkhaṃ sahanto araññāyatane gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a1:921_5: samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmi. Ko pana vādo pādehi akkamaneti dasseti. Vivekamanubrūhayanti
atk-s0508a1:921_6: kāyavivekaṃ cittavivekaṃ upadhivivekañca anubrūhayanto. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikañhi pahāya kāyavivekaṃ
atk-s0508a1:921_7: anubrūhayantasseva aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ samādahantassa
atk-s0508a1:921_8: cittaviveko, na saṅgaṇikāratassa. Samāhitasseva vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa samathavipassanañca
atk-s0508a1:921_9: yuganaddhaṃ karontassa kilesānaṃ khepanena upadhivivekādhigamo, na asamāhitassa.
atk-s0508a1:921_10: Tena vuttaṃ “vivekamanubrūhayanti kāyavivekaṃ cittavivekaṃ upadhivivekañca anubrūhayanto”ti.
atk-s0508a1:921_11: Evaṃ pana puttena vutte mātā “tena hi, tāta, pabbajā”ti anujāni. So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a1:921_12: pabbajjaṃ yāci. Taṃ satthā pabbājesi. Taṃ pabbajitvā katapubbakiccaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:921_13: gahetvā araññaṃ pavisantaṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tvaṃ sukhumālo kiṃ sakkhissasi
atk-s0508a1:921_14: araññe vasitu”nti. So tesampi tameva gāthaṃ vatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a1:921_15: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:927: Arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto taṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:930_0: Kacci no vatthapasutoti āyasmato jambugāmiyaputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So
atk-s0508a1:930_1: kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro hutvā tattha tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ ācinanto
atk-s0508a1:930_2: ito ekatiṃse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle ekadivasaṃ kiṃsukāni pupphāni disvā
atk-s0508a1:930_3: tāni pupphāni gahetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto bhagavantaṃ uddissa ākāse khipanto pūjesi.
atk-s0508a1:930_4: So tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu nibbatto. Tato paraṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:930_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ jambugāmiyassa nāma upāsakassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a1:930_6: nibbatti. Tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu nibbatto. Tato paraṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a1:930_7: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ jambugāmiyassa nāma upāsakassa
atk-s0508a1:930_8: putvā nibbatti. Tenassa jambugāmiyaputtotveva samaññā ahosi. So vayappatto bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:930_9: santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a1:930_10: sākete añjanavane vasati. Athassa pitā “kiṃ nu kho mama putto sāsane abhirato viharati,
atk-s0508a1:930_11: udāhu no”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ “kacci no vatthapasuto”ti gāthaṃ likhitvā pesesi. So taṃ
atk-s0508a1:930_12: vācetvā, “pitā me pamādavihāraṃ āsaṅkati, ahañca ajjāpi puthujjanabhūmiṃ nātivatto”ti
atk-s0508a1:930_13: saṃvegajāto ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:938_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā ñātīnaṃ vasananagaraṃ gantvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0508a1:938_1: iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Taṃ disvā ñātakā pasannamānasā bahū saṅghārāme kāresuṃ.
