atk-s0508a1:3600_9: hatthato pattaṃ agahetvāva vihāraṃ gato taṃ pattahatthaṃ vihāraṃ āgataṃ anicchamānaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3600_10: pabbājetvā tathā pabbajitattāyeva anabhiratiyā pīḷitaṃ ñatvā upāyena tassa taṃ anabhiratiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3600_11: vinodesi. So yoniso paṭisaṅkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:3610: Sukhaṃ me tādisaṃ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a1:3614: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a1:3628_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto “aho satthu upāyakosallaṃ, yenāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3628_1: bhavapaṅkato uddharitvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhāpito”ti attano pahīnasaṃkilesaṃ paṭiladdhañca
atk-s0508a1:3634: Yoniso paṭipajjitvā, bhave cittaṃ udabbahi”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3635_0: Tattha ayoniso manasikārāti anupāyamanasikārato asubhaṃ kāyaṃ subhato manasi karitvā
atk-s0508a1:3635_1: subhato manasikārahetu, asubhaṃ kāyaṃ subhasaññāyāti attho. Maṇḍananti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi
atk-s0508a1:3635_2: ceva mālāgandhādīhi ca attabhāvassa alaṅkaraṇaṃ. Anuyuñjisanti anuyuñjiṃ, sarīrassa
atk-s0508a1:3635_3: vibhūsanappasuto ahosinti attho. Uddhatoti jātigottarūpayobbanamadādīhi uddhato avūpasantacitto.
atk-s0508a1:3635_4: Capaloti vanamakkaṭo viya anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lolo, kāyamaṇḍanavatthamaṇḍanādicāpalye
atk-s0508a1:3635_5: yuttatāya vā capalo ca. Āsinti ahosiṃ. Kāmarāgenāti vatthukāmesu chandarāgena aṭṭito
atk-s0508a1:3636_0: Upāyakusalenāti vineyyānaṃ damanūpāyacchekena kovidena buddhena bhagavatā hetubhūtena.
atk-s0508a1:3636_1: Hetuatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Paluṭṭhamakkaṭīdevaccharādassanena hi upakkitavādacodanāya
atk-s0508a1:3636_2: attano kāmarāgāpanayanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Bhagavā hi āyasmantaṃ nandattheraṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3636_3: janapadakalyāṇiṃ upādāya “yathāyaṃ makkaṭī, evaṃ kakuṭapādiniyo upādāya janapadakalyāṇī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3636_4: mahatiyā āṇiyā khuddakaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto chaḍḍako viya, sinehapānena sarīraṃ kiledetvā
atk-s0508a1:3636_5: vamanavirecanehi dosaṃ nīharanto bhisakko viya ca kakuṭapādinidassanena janapadakalyāṇiyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3636_6: virattacittaṃ kāretvā puna upakkitavādena kakuṭapādinīsupi cittaṃ virājetvā sammadeva
atk-s0508a1:3636_7: samathavipassanānuyogena ariyamagge patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ “yoniso paṭipajjitvā,
atk-s0508a1:3636_8: bhave cittaṃ udabbahi”nti. Upāyena ñāyena sammadeva samathavipassanāya visuddhipaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3636_9: paṭipajjitvā bhave saṃsārapaṅke nimuggañca me cittaṃ ariyamaggena hatthena uttāriṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3637_0: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā thero punadivase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me,
atk-s0508a1:3637_1: bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ, muñcāmahaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3637_2: bhante, bhagavantaṃ etasmā paṭissavā”ti. Bhagavāpi, “yadeva kho te, nanda, anupādāya
atk-s0508a1:3637_3: āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, athāhaṃ mutto etasmā paṭissavā”ti āha. Athassa bhagavā savisesaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3637_4: indriyesu guttadvārataṃ ñatvā taṃ guṇaṃ vibhāvento, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3637_5: bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti indriyesu guttadvārabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a1:3637_6: ṭhapesi. Thero hi “yamevāhaṃ indriyānaṃ asaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0508a1:3637_7: tamevāhaṃ suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā
atk-s0508a1:3640_0: Pare ca naṃ pasaṃsantīti āyasmato sirimattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3640_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato pāramiyo
atk-s0508a1:3640_2: pūretvā tusitabhavane ṭhitakāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3640_3: pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sakkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo
atk-s0508a1:3640_4: lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3640_5: pabbajitvā caturāsītisahassaparimāṇena tāpasagaṇena parivuto himavantappadese devatābhinimmite
atk-s0508a1:3640_6: assame jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā vasanto purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya lakkhaṇamantesu
atk-s0508a1:3640_7: āgataniyāmena ca buddhaguṇe anussaritvā atīte buddhe uddissa aññatarasmiṃ nadīnivattane
atk-s0508a1:3640_8: pulinacetiyaṃ katvā pūjāsakkārābhirato ahosi. Taṃ disvā tāpasā, “kaṃ uddissa ayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3640_9: pūjāsakkāro karīyatī”ti pucchiṃsu. So tesaṃ lakkhaṇamante āharitvā tattha āgatāni
atk-s0508a1:3640_10: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni vibhajitvā tadanusārena attano bale ṭhatvā buddhaguṇe kittesi.
atk-s0508a1:3640_11: Taṃ sutvā tepi tāpasā pasannamānasā tato paṭṭhāya sammāsambuddhaṃ uddissa thūpapūjaṃ karontā viharanti.
atk-s0508a1:3641_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkanto hoti.
atk-s0508a1:3641_1: Carimabhave dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ, sabbe ca acchariyabbhūtadhammā.
atk-s0508a1:3641_2: Tāpaso tāni antevāsikānaṃ dassetvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ pasādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3641_3: vaḍḍhetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattitvā tehi attano sarīrassa pūjāya karīyamānāya
atk-s0508a1:3641_4: dissamānarūpo āgantvā, “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ ācariyo brahmaloke nibbatto, tumhe appamattā
atk-s0508a1:3641_5: pulinacetiyapūjamanuyuñjatha, bhāvanāya ca yuttappayuttā hothā”ti vatvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0508a1:3642_0: Evaṃ so devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a1:3642_1: tassa jātadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ kule sirisampattiyā vaḍḍhamānattā sirimātveva
atk-s0508a1:3642_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassa padasā gamanakāle kaniṭṭhabhātā nibbatti, tassa “ayaṃ siriṃ vaḍḍhento
atk-s0508a1:3642_3: jāto”ti sirivaḍḍhoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Te ubhopi jetavanappaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3642_4: disvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajiṃsu. Tesu sirivaḍḍho na tāva uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-s0508a1:3642_5: lābhī ahosi, catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ lābhī, gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sakkato garukato, sirimatthero
atk-s0508a1:3642_6: pana pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya tādisena kammacchiddena appalābhī ahosi bahujanāsambhāvito,
atk-s0508a1:3642_7: samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3644: Tattha me caṅkamo āsi, amanussehi māpito.
atk-s0508a1:3652: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3653: “Pulinena kato thūpo, yaṃ tvaṃ deva namassasi;
atk-s0508a1:3654: Mayampi ñātumicchāma, puṭṭho ācikkha no tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3656: Te kho ahaṃ namassāmi, buddhaseṭṭhe mahāyase.
atk-s0508a1:3662: Na tesaṃ jāṇu nadati, sandhisaddo na suyyati.
atk-s0508a1:3664: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, buddhānaṃ esa dhammatā.
atk-s0508a1:3666: Nevukkaṃsenti attānaṃ, no ca vambhenti pāṇinaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3682: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, āgacchuṃ mama santike.
atk-s0508a1:3689: “Balañca vata me khīṇaṃ, byādhinā paramena taṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3696: Ahaṃ ācariyo tumhaṃ, mā socittha sumedhasā.
atk-s0508a1:3698: Mā vo pamattā ahuttha, khaṇo vo paṭipādito.
atk-s0508a1:3712_0: Chaḷabhiññañhi samānaṃ āyasmantaṃ sirimattheraṃ “ariyo”ti ajānantā puthujjanā bhikkhū
atk-s0508a1:3712_1: sāmaṇerā ca appalābhitāya lokassa anabhigatabhāvena asambhāventā yaṃkiñci kathetvā
atk-s0508a1:3712_2: garahanti. Sirivaḍḍhattheraṃ pana paccayānaṃ lābhibhāvena lokassa sakkatagarukatabhāvato
atk-s0508a1:3712_3: sambhāventā pasaṃsanti. Thero “avaṇṇārahassa nāma vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ, vaṇṇārahassa ca
atk-s0508a1:3712_4: avaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ assa puthujjanabhāvassa doso”ti puthujjanabhāvañca garahanto –
atk-s0508a1:3714: “Pare ca naṃ pasaṃsanti, attā ce asamāhito;
atk-s0508a1:3715: Moghaṃ pare pasaṃsanti, attā hi asamāhito.
atk-s0508a1:3717: “Pare ca naṃ garahanti, attā ce susamāhito;
atk-s0508a1:3718: Moghaṃ pare garahanti, attā hi susamāhito”ti.
atk-s0508a1:3720_0: Tattha pareti attato aññe pare nāma, idha pana paṇḍitehi aññe bālā pareti adhippetā.
atk-s0508a1:3720_1: Tesañhi ajānitvā apariyogāhetvā bhāsanato garahā viya pasaṃsāpi appamāṇabhūtā. Nanti
atk-s0508a1:3720_2: naṃ puggalaṃ. Pasaṃsantīti aviddasubhāvena taṇhāvipannatāya vā, atha vā abhūtaṃyeva
atk-s0508a1:3720_3: puggalaṃ “asuko bhikkhu jhānalābhī, ariyo”ti vā abhūtaguṇaropanena kittenti abhitthavanti.
atk-s0508a1:3720_4: Yo panettha ca-saddo, so attūpanayattho. Tena pare naṃ puggalaṃ pasaṃsanti ca, tañca
atk-s0508a1:3720_5: kho tesaṃ pasaṃsanamattaṃ, na pana tasmiṃ pasaṃsāya vatthu atthīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3720_6: Attā ce asamāhitoti yaṃ puggalaṃ pare pasaṃsanti, so ce sayaṃ asamāhito maggasamādhinā
atk-s0508a1:3720_7: phalasamādhinā upacārappanāsamādhimatteneva vā na samāhito, samādhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3720_8: kilesānaṃ appahīnattā vikkhitto vibbhantacitto hoti ceti attho. “Asamāhito”ti ca
atk-s0508a1:3720_9: etena samādhinimittānaṃ guṇānaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti. Moghanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso “visamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3720_10: candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya. Pare pasaṃsantīti ye taṃ asamāhitaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3720_11: pasaṃsanti, te moghaṃ mudhā amūlakaṃ pasaṃsanti. Kasmā? Attā hi asamāhito yasmā tassa
atk-s0508a1:3721_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ garahantīti attano aviddasubhāvena dosantarāya vā ariyaṃ jhānalābhiñca
atk-s0508a1:3721_1: samānaṃ “asuko bhikkhu jāgariyaṃ nānuyuñjati antamaso goduhanamattampi kālaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3721_2: kāyadaḷhibahulo niddārāmo bhassārāmo saṅgaṇikārāmo viharatī”tiādinā appaṭipajjamānatāvibhāvanena
atk-s0508a1:3721_3: vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā garahanti nindanti, upakkosanti vāti attho. Sesaṃ paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0508a1:3721_4: vuttapariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ therena imāhi gāthāhi attano nikkilesabhāve sirivaḍḍhassa
atk-s0508a1:3721_5: ca sakilesabhāve pakāsite taṃ sutvā sirivaḍḍho saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a1:3721_6: nacirasseva sadatthaṃ paripūresi, garahakapuggalā ca theraṃ khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3726_0: Khandhā mayā pariññātāti āyasmato uttarattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3726_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a1:3726_2: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane laddhappasādo
atk-s0508a1:3726_3: hutvā upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. So satthari parinibbute attano ñātake sannipātetvā
atk-s0508a1:3726_4: bahuṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ sambharitvā dhātupūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:3726_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uttaroti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:3726_6: vayappatto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiṃ gato kaṇḍambamūle kataṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3726_7: disvā pasīditvā puna kāḷakārāmasuttadesanāya abhivaḍḍhamānasaddho pabbajitvā satthārā
atk-s0508a1:3726_8: saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā upasampajjitvā tattheva vasanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:3732_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante buddhupaṭṭhānatthaṃ rājagahato
atk-s0508a1:3732_1: sāvatthiṃ upagato bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso, pabbajjākiccaṃ tayā matthakaṃ pāpita”nti
atk-s0508a1:3735: Bhāvitā mama bojjhaṅgā, patto me āsavakkhayo.
atk-s0508a1:3738: Bhāvayitvāna bojjhaṅge, nibbāyissaṃ anāsavo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3739_0: Tattha khandhāti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Pariññātāti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti
atk-s0508a1:3739_1: paricchijja ñātā bhāvitā. Tena dukkhassa ariyasaccassa pariññābhisamayamāha. Taṇhāti
atk-s0508a1:3739_2: tasati paritasatīti taṇhā. Susamūhatāti samugghāṭitā. Etena samudayasaccassa pahānābhisamayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3739_3: vadati. Bhāvitā mama bojjhaṅgāti bodhisaṅkhātāya satiādidhammasāmaggiyā, taṃsamaṅgino
atk-s0508a1:3739_5: maggapariyāpannā dhammā mayā bhāvitā uppāditā vaḍḍhitā. Bojjhaṅgaggahaṇeneva cettha
atk-s0508a1:3739_6: taṃsahacaritatāya sabbe maggadhammā, sabbe ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0508a1:3739_7: Eteneva maggasaccassa bhāvanābhisamayaṃ dasseti. Patto me āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādayo
atk-s0508a1:3739_8: āsavā khīyanti etthāti āsavakkhayoti laddhanāmo asaṅkhatadhammo mayā patto adhigato.
atk-s0508a1:3739_9: Etena nirodhasaccassa sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ katheti. Ettāvatā attano saupādisesanibbānasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3740_0: Idāni pana anupādisesanibbānasampattiṃ dassento “soha”ntiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:3740_1: Tassattho – sohaṃ evaṃ vuttanayena khandhe pariññāya parijānitvā, tathā parijānanto
atk-s0508a1:3740_3: punappunaṃ pavattisaṅkhātaṃ jālaṃ etassa atthīti jālinīti laddhanāmaṃ taṇhaṃ abbahitvāna
atk-s0508a1:3740_4: mama cittasantānato uddharitvā, tathā naṃ uddharantoyeva vuttappabhede bojjhaṅge
atk-s0508a1:3740_5: bhāvayitvāna te bhāvanāpāripūriṃ pāpetvā tato eva anāsavo hutvā ṭhito idāni carimakacittanirodhena
atk-s0508a1:3743_0: Panādo nāma so rājāti āyasmato bhaddajittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:3743_1: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3743_2: gantvā kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vasanto
atk-s0508a1:3743_3: ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3743_4: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ākāsato otari. Otiṇṇassa pana bhagavato madhuñca bhisamuḷālañca
atk-s0508a1:3743_5: sappiñca khīrañca upanāmesi, tassa taṃ bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3743_6: vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena tusite nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato
atk-s0508a1:3743_7: aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahaddhano seṭṭhi hutvā
atk-s0508a1:3744_0: Evaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0508a1:3744_1: manussesu uppanno buddhasuññe loke pañca paccekabuddhasatāni catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:3744_2: tato cuto rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṃ anusāsanto puttaṃ paccekabodhiṃ adhigantvā
atk-s0508a1:3744_3: ṭhitaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā tassa parinibbutassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ katvā pūjesi. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3744_4: tattha tattha tāni puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare asītikoṭivibhavassa
atk-s0508a1:3744_5: bhaddiyaseṭṭhissa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti, bhaddajītissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Tassa kira
atk-s0508a1:3745_0: Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā bhaddajikumāraṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a1:3745_1: saddhiṃ bhaddiyanagaraṃ gantvā jātiyāvane vasi tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno. Sopi
atk-s0508a1:3745_2: upari pāsāde nisinno sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokento bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0508a1:3745_3: gacchantaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā “katthāyaṃ mahājano gacchatī”ti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3745_4: sutvā sayampi mahatā parivārena satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova
atk-s0508a1:3745_5: sabbakilese khepetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3747: Uddharāmi bhisaṃ tattha, ghāsahetu ahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3753: Madhuṃ bhisehi sahitaṃ, khīraṃ sappiṃ muḷālikaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3763: Bhisaṃ rukkhe laggetvāna, mama dānaṃ anussariṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3765: Ākāso abhinādittha, asanī ca phalī tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3767: Sohaṃ nisinnako santo, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3773: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, bhisadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3779_0: Arahatte pana tena adhigate satthā bhaddiyaseṭṭhiṃ āmantesi – “tava putto alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
atk-s0508a1:3779_1: dhammaṃ suṇanto arahatte patiṭṭhāsi, tenassa idāneva pabbajituṃ yuttaṃ, no ce pabbajati,
atk-s0508a1:3779_2: parinibbāyissatī”ti. Seṭṭhi “na mayhaṃ puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbānena kiccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3779_3: atthi, pabbājetha na”nti āha. Taṃ satthā pabbājetvā upasampādetvā tattha sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3779_4: vasitvā koṭigāmaṃ pāpuṇi, so ca gāmo gaṅgātīre. Koṭigāmavāsino buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0508a1:3779_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ. Bhaddajitthero satthārā anumodanāya āraddhamattāya
atk-s0508a1:3779_6: bahigāmaṃ gantvā “gaṅgātīre maggasamīpe satthu āgatakāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti samāpattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3779_7: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Mahātheresu āgacchantesupi avuṭṭhahitvā satthu āgatakāleyeva
atk-s0508a1:3779_8: vuṭṭhahi. Puthujjanabhikkhū, “ayaṃ adhunā pabbajito mahātheresu āgacchantesu mānatthaddho
atk-s0508a1:3779_9: hutvā na vuṭṭhāsī”ti ujjhāyiṃsu. Koṭigāmavāsino satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bahū nāvāsaṅghāṭe
atk-s0508a1:3779_10: bandhiṃsu, satthā “handassa ānubhāvaṃ pakāsemī”ti nāvāsaṅghāṭe ṭhatvā, “kahaṃ, bhaddajī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3779_11: pucchi. Bhaddajitthero “esohaṃ, bhante”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3779_12: Satthā, “ehi, bhaddaji, amhehi saddhiṃ ekanāvaṃ abhiruhā”ti. So uppatitvā satthu
atk-s0508a1:3779_13: ṭhitanāvāyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Satthā gaṅgāmajjhaṃ gatakāle, “bhaddaji, tayā mahāpanādarājakāle
atk-s0508a1:3779_14: ajjhāvuṭṭharatanapāsādo kaha”nti āha. “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne nimuggo”ti. “Tena hi, bhaddaji,
atk-s0508a1:3779_15: sabrahmacārīnaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindā”ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero satthāraṃ vanditvā iddhibalena
atk-s0508a1:3779_16: gantvā pāsādathūpikaṃ pādaṅgulantarena sannirumbhitvā pañcavīsatiyojanaṃ pāsādaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3779_17: gahetvā ākāse uppati, uppatanto ca paññāsa yojanāni pāsādaṃ udakato ukkhipi. Athassa
atk-s0508a1:3779_18: purimabhave ñātakā pāsādagatena lobhena macchakacchapamaṇḍūkā hutvā tasmiṃ pāsāde
atk-s0508a1:3779_19: uṭṭhahante parivattitvā udake patiṃsu. Satthā te patante disvā “ñātakā te, bhaddaji,
atk-s0508a1:3779_20: kilamantī”ti āha. Thero satthu vacanena pāsādaṃ vissajjesi. Pāsādo yathāṭhāne eva
atk-s0508a1:3779_21: patiṭṭhahi. Satthā pāraṅgato bhikkhūhi “kadā, bhante, bhaddajittherena ayaṃ pāsādo
atk-s0508a1:3779_22: ajjhāvuṭṭho”ti puṭṭho mahāpanādajātakaṃ kathetvā mahājanaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. Thero
atk-s0508a1:3781: “Panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo;
atk-s0508a1:3785: Anaccuṃ tattha gandhabbā, cha sahassāni sattadhā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3787_0: Tattha panādo nāma so rājāti atīte panādo nāma so rājā ahosīti attabhāvaantarahitatāya
atk-s0508a1:3787_1: attānaṃ paraṃ viya niddisati. So eva hi rajje ṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya sadā ussāhasampattiādinā
atk-s0508a1:3787_2: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā ca kittisaddena samannāgatattā “rājā mahāpanādo”ti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:3787_3: Yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayoti yassa rañño ayaṃ yūpo pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo. Tiriyaṃ soḷasubbedhoti
atk-s0508a1:3787_4: vitthārato soḷasakaṇḍapātappamāṇo. So pana aḍḍhayojanamatto hoti. Ubbhāmāhu sahassadhāti
atk-s0508a1:3787_5: ubbhaṃ uccaṃ evamassa pāsādassa sahassadhā sahassakaṇḍappamāṇamāhu. So pana yojanato
atk-s0508a1:3787_6: pañcavīsatiyojanappamāṇo hoti. Keci panettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ “āhū”ti dīghaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3788_0: Sahassakaṇḍoti sahassabhūmiko. Satageṇḍūti anekasataniyyūhako. Dhajālūti tattha tattha
atk-s0508a1:3788_3: naṭā. Cha sahassāni sattadhāti chamattāni gandhabbasahassāni sattadhā tassa pāsādassa
atk-s0508a1:3788_4: sattasu ṭhānesu rañño abhiramāpanatthaṃ nacciṃsūti attho. Te evaṃ naccantāpi rājānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3788_5: hāsetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Atha sakko devarājā devanaṭe pesetvā samajjaṃ kāresi, tadā rājā hasīti.
atk-s0508a1:3791_0: Satimā paññavāti āyasmato sobhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3791_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a1:3791_2: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3791_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a1:3791_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ uddissa patthanaṃ katvā puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a1:3791_5: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3791_6: gantvā nekkhammādhimutto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantassa
atk-s0508a1:3791_7: samīpe araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāphalena yāpento buddhuppādaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:3791_8: sabbattha ekarattivāseneva bhaddavatīnagare satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3791_9: “tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu cā”tiādīhi chahi gāthāhi abhitthavi, satthā cassa bhāviniṃ
atk-s0508a1:3791_10: sampattiṃ pakāsesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:3791_11: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Sobhitotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So aparena samayena
atk-s0508a1:3791_12: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a1:3791_13: ahosi. Pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ca ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3798: “Nāhaṃ suṇomi sambuddhaṃ, napi me koci saṃsati;
atk-s0508a1:3805: Uddharanto bahū satte, deseti amataṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3808: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3809: Parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0508a1:3813: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a1:3817: Natveva tava sabbaññu, sīlaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a1:3833: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:3839: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, phalaṃ ñāṇassa thomane.
atk-s0508a1:3845_0: So arahattaṃ pana patvā attano pubbenivāsaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā anussaranto yāva asaññabhave
atk-s0508a1:3845_1: acittakapaṭisandhi, tāva addasa. Tato pañca kappasatāni cittappavattiṃ adisvā avasāneva
atk-s0508a1:3845_2: disvā “kimeta”nti āvajjento nayavasena “asaññabhavo bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a1:3845_3: Tenāha bhagavā – “atthi, bhikkhave, asaññasattā nāma dīghāyukā devā, tato cuto sobhito
atk-s0508a1:3845_4: idhūpapanno, so etaṃ bhavaṃ jānāti, sobhito anussaratī”ti. Evaṃ nayavasena anussarantassa
atk-s0508a1:3845_5: anussaraṇakosallaṃ disvā satthā theraṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a1:3845_6: Tato eva cāyaṃ āyasmā savisesaṃ attano pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ tassa ca paccayabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3845_7: paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto tadatthadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānento –
atk-s0508a1:3851: Pañca kappasatānāhaṃ, ekarattiṃ anussari”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3852_0: Tattha satimāti sayaṃ samudāgamanasampannāya satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā sativepullappattiyā
atk-s0508a1:3852_1: ca satimā. Paññavāti chaḷabhiññāpāripūriyā paññāvepullappattiyā ca paññavā. Bhinnakilesatāya
atk-s0508a1:3852_3: āraddhabalavīriyo. Saddhādīnañhettha balaggahaṇena gahaṇaṃ satipi satiādīnaṃ balabhāve,
atk-s0508a1:3852_4: yathā “gobalibaddhā puññañāṇasambhārā”ti. Pañca kappasatānāhaṃ, ekarattiṃ anussarinti
atk-s0508a1:3852_5: ekarattiṃ viya anussariṃ. Viya-saddo hi idha luttaniddiṭṭho, etena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇe
atk-s0508a1:3853_0: Idāni yāya paṭipattiyā attano satimantādibhāvo sātisayaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇañca siddhaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3853_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro”tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhāneti kāyānupassanādike
atk-s0508a1:3853_2: attano visayabhedena catubbidhe lokiyalokuttaramissake satisaṅkhāte satipaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0508a1:3853_3: Sattāti satta bojjhaṅge. Aṭṭhāti aṭṭha maggaṅgāni. Satipaṭṭhānesu hi suppatiṭṭhitacittassa
atk-s0508a1:3853_4: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gatā eva honti, tathā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Tenāha
atk-s0508a1:3853_5: dhammasenāpati – “catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3853_6: bhāvetvā”tiādīhi sattakoṭṭhāsikesu sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammesu ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
atk-s0508a1:3853_7: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchante itare agacchantā nāma natthīti. Bhāvayanti bhāvanāhetu.
atk-s0508a1:3856_0: Yaṃ kiccaṃ daḷhavīriyenātiādikā āyasmato valliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:3856_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3856_2: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato asītikoṭivibhavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3856_3: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde araññāyatane ekissā nadiyā tīre assamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3856_4: kāretvā viharanto attano anuggaṇhanatthaṃ upagataṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:3856_5: ajinacammaṃ pattharitvā adāsi. Tattha nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ pupphehi ca candanena
atk-s0508a1:3856_6: ca pūjetvā ambaphalāni datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Tassa bhagavā nisinnāsanasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3856_7: pakāsento anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:3856_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā “kaṇhamitto”ti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:3856_9: vayappatto satthu vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mahākaccānattherassa
atk-s0508a1:3856_10: santike pabbaji. So mandapañño dandhaparakkamo ca hutvā ciraṃ kālaṃ viññuṃ sabrahmacāriṃ
atk-s0508a1:3856_11: nissāyeva vasati. Bhikkhū “yathā nāma valli rukkhādīsu kiñci anissāya vaḍḍhituṃ na
atk-s0508a1:3856_12: sakkoti, evamayampi kañci paṇḍitaṃ anissāya vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkotī”ti valliyotveva
atk-s0508a1:3856_13: samudācariṃsu. Aparabhāge pana veṇudattattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a1:3856_14: sato sampajāno hutvā viharanto ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā paṭipattikkamaṃ theraṃ pucchanto –
atk-s0508a1:3862: Ahaṃ monena monissaṃ, gaṅgāsotova sāgara”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3863_0: Tattha yaṃ kiccaṃ daḷhavīriyenāti daḷhena vīriyena thirena parakkamena, daḷhavīriyena
atk-s0508a1:3863_1: vā purisadhorayhena yaṃ kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yaṃ kiccaṃ boddhumicchatāti
atk-s0508a1:3863_2: cattāri ariyasaccāni nibbānameva vā boddhuṃ bujjhituṃ icchantena paṭivijjhitukāmena
atk-s0508a1:3863_3: yaṃ kiccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Karissaṃ nāvarajjhissanti tamahaṃ dāni karissaṃ na virādhessaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:3863_4: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmi. Passa vīriyaṃ parakkamanti yathā paṭipajjamāne dhamme
atk-s0508a1:3863_5: vidhinā īraṇato “vīriyaṃ”, paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato “parakkamo”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3863_6: sammāvāyāmaṃ passa na saddhamevāti attano kattukāmataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:3864_0: Tvañcāti kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ālapati. Meti mayhaṃ. Maggamakkhāhīti ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3864_1: kathehi, lokuttaramaggasampāpakaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehīti attho. Añjasanti
atk-s0508a1:3864_2: ujukaṃ majjhimapaṭipadābhāvena antadvayassa anupagamanato. Amate nibbāne sampāpakabhāvena
atk-s0508a1:3864_3: patiṭṭhitattā amatogadhaṃ. Monenāti ñāṇena maggapaññāya. Monissanti jānissaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3864_4: paṭivijjhissaṃ pāpuṇissaṃ. Gaṅgāsotova sāgaranti yathā gaṅgāya soto sāgaraṃ samuddaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3864_5: avirajjhanto ekaṃsato ogāhati, evaṃ “ahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3864_6: adhigamissāmi, tasmā taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ me ācikkhathā”ti theraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a1:3865: Taṃ sutvā veṇudattatthero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. Sopi kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3874: “Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, mahābrahmā idhāgato;
atk-s0508a1:3875: Virocesi disā sabbā, udayaṃ sūriyo yathā.
atk-s0508a1:3877: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3879: Namhi devā na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado.
atk-s0508a1:3880: “Brahmabhāvo ca me natthi, etesaṃ uttamo ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3895: Mama kammaṃ pakittesi, hāsayanto mamaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3913: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3925: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto thero imāyeva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:3928_0: Kese me olikhissantītiādikā āyasmato vītasokattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:3928_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3928_2: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāme pahāya
atk-s0508a1:3928_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahatā isigaṇena parivuto araññe vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:3928_4: haṭṭhatuṭṭho “udumbarapupphasadisā dullabhadassanā buddhā bhagavanto, idāneva upagantabbā”ti
atk-s0508a1:3928_5: mahatiyā parisāya saddhiṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ gacchanto diyaḍḍhayojane sese byādhiko
atk-s0508a1:3928_6: hutvā buddhagatāya saññāya kālaṅkato devesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:3928_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake dhammāsokarañño
atk-s0508a1:3928_8: kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti, tassa vītasokoti nāma ahosi. So vayappatto khattiyakumārehi
atk-s0508a1:3928_9: sikkhitabbavijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato giridattattheraṃ nissāya gihibhūto suttantapiṭake
atk-s0508a1:3928_10: abhidhammapiṭake ca visārado hutvā ekadivasaṃ massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato
atk-s0508a1:3928_11: ādāsaṃ gahetvā kāyaṃ olokento valitapalitādīni disvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanāya cittaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3928_12: otāretvā bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā giridattattherassa
atk-s0508a1:3928_13: santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3935: “Mama aññataro sisso, sissānaṃ so kathesi me;
atk-s0508a1:3936: Sutvāna te etamatthaṃ, ārocesuṃ mamaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:3938: Tassānuvattati jano, lābho amhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a1:3947: “Buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhuṃ lacchāma no bhavaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:3966: Sabbe coḷā samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:3967_0: Tattha kese me olikhissanti, kappako upasaṅkamīti gihikāle massukammasamaye “mama
atk-s0508a1:3967_1: kese olikhissaṃ kappemī”ti kesādīnaṃ chedanādivasena kappanato kappako nhāpito maṃ
atk-s0508a1:3967_2: upagacchi. Tatoti kappakato. Sarīraṃ paccavekkhisanti sabbakāyike ādāse palitavalitamukhanimittādidassanamukhena
atk-s0508a1:3967_3: “abhibhūto vata jarāya me kāyo”ti jarābhibhūtaṃ attano sarīraṃ paccavekkhiṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3967_4: paccavekkhato ca tuccho kāyo adissittha niccadhuvasukhasabhāvādīhi ritto hutvā me
atk-s0508a1:3967_5: kāyo adissatha paññāyi. Kasmā? Andhakāre tamo byagā yena ayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a1:3967_6: tamasā attano kāye andhagatā vijjamānampi asubhādisabhāvaṃ apassantā avijjamānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3967_7: subhādiākāraṃ gaṇhanti, tasmiṃ andhakāre andhakaraṇaṭṭhāne kāye yonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a1:3967_8: ñāṇālokena avijjātamo vigato, tato eva sabbe coḷā samucchinnā corā viya kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato,
atk-s0508a1:3967_9: sādhūhi alātabbato asaṅgahetabbato saṅkārakūṭādīsu chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ viya issarajanena
atk-s0508a1:3967_10: ariyajanena jigucchitabbatāya coḷā viyāti vā “coḷā”ti laddhanāmā kilesā samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a1:3967_11: Aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā eva ca nesaṃ natthi dāni punabbhavo āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti natthīti.
atk-s0508a1:3970_0: Pañca nīvaraṇe hitvātiādikā āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:3970_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a1:3970_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthari araññe viharante paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3970_3: dumasākhāya laggetvā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe dhanuhattho gahanaṃ paviṭṭho satthu paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3970_4: disvā pasannamānaso dhanuṃ nikkhipitvā buddhaguṇe anussaritvā paṃsukūlaṃ vandi. So
atk-s0508a1:3970_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbiyakule
atk-s0508a1:3970_6: nibbatti. Tassa kira jātadivase tasmiṃ gehe sabbabhājanāni suvaṇṇaratanamayehi māsehi
atk-s0508a1:3970_7: paripuṇṇāneva ahesuṃ. Tenassa puṇṇamāsotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto dārapariggahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3970_8: katvā ekasmiṃ putte uppanne gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā gāmakāvāse vasanto ghaṭento
atk-s0508a1:3970_9: vāyamanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:3976: Cāpaṃ tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvāna añjaliṃ.
atk-s0508a1:3982_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sāvatthiṃ upagantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā susāne vasati, tassa
atk-s0508a1:3982_1: ca acirāgatasseva sato putto kālamakāsi. Dārakamātā therassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā, “mā
atk-s0508a1:3982_2: idaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājāno hareyyu”nti taṃ uppabbājetukāmā mahatā parivārena
atk-s0508a1:3982_3: therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā palobhetuṃ ārabhi. Thero attano vītarāgabhāvajānāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3982_4: ākāse ṭhatvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena tassā dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a1:3988: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, tuccho kāyo adissathā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:3990_0: Tattha pañca nīvaraṇe hitvāti kāmacchandādike pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya jhānādhigamena
atk-s0508a1:3990_1: viddhaṃsetvā. Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti kāmayogādīhi catūhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa
atk-s0508a1:3990_2: nibbānassa adhigamāya. Dhammādāsanti dhammabhūtaṃ ādāsaṃ. Yathā hi ādāso olokentassa
atk-s0508a1:3990_3: rūpakāye guṇāguṇaṃ ādaṃseti, evaṃ vipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ sāmaññavisesāvabodhanato
atk-s0508a1:3990_5: ca visesato nāmakāye guṇaṃ ādaṃseti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a1:3993_0: Imaṃ kāyaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ mama attabhāvaṃ ajjhattikabāhirāyatanabhāvato santarabāhiraṃ
atk-s0508a1:3993_2: ñāṇacakkhunā passiṃ. Evaṃ passatā ca mayā ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti attano santāne
atk-s0508a1:3993_3: parasantāne ca tuccho kāyo adissatha niccasārādivirahito tuccho khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto
atk-s0508a1:3993_4: attabhāvakāyo ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato apassittha. Sakalampi hi khandhapañcakaṃ “avijjānivutassa,
atk-s0508a1:3993_5: bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāsaṃyuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato”tiādīsu “kāyo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a1:3993_6: “Adissathā”ti ca iminā yadeva kāye daṭṭhabbaṃ, taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, na dānissa kiñci mayā
atk-s0508a1:3993_7: passitabbaṃ atthīti katakiccataṃ dassento aññaṃ byākāsi. Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi
atk-s0508a1:3993_8: purāṇadutiyikāya dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca sampatiṭṭhāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0508a1:3996_0: Yathāpi bhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:3996_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle paccantadese
atk-s0508a1:3996_2: uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto vanacāriko hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3996_3: disvā pasannacitto vālukā okiri. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:3996_4: buddhuppāde campāyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa nandakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Jeṭṭhakabhātā
atk-s0508a1:3996_5: panassa bharato nāma. Tassa pubbayogo anantaravatthusmiṃ āvibhavissati. Te ubhopi
atk-s0508a1:3996_6: viññutaṃ patvā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ koḷivisaṃ pabbajitaṃ sutvā “soṇopi nāma tathāsukhumālo
atk-s0508a1:3996_7: pabbaji, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya”nti pabbajiṃsu. Tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a1:3996_8: chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Nandako pana kilesānaṃ balavabhāvena tāva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ
atk-s0508a1:3996_9: nāsakkhi, vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti eva. Athassa bharatatthero āsayaṃ ñatvā avassayo
atk-s0508a1:3996_10: bhavitukāmo taṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vihārato nikkhamitvā maggasamīpe nisinno vipassanākathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a1:3997_0: Tena ca samayena sakaṭasatthe gacchante eko sakaṭe yutto goṇo cikkhallaṭṭhāne sakaṭaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3997_1: uddharituṃ asakkonto paripati. Tato naṃ satthavāho sakaṭā mocetvā tiṇañca pānīyañca
atk-s0508a1:3997_2: datvā parissamaṃ apanetvā puna dhure yojesi. Tato goṇo vūpasantaparissamo laddhabalo
atk-s0508a1:3997_3: taṃ sakaṭaṃ cikkhallaṭṭhānato uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi. Atha bharatatthero nandakassa
atk-s0508a1:3997_4: “passasi no tvaṃ, āvuso nandaka, imassa kamma”nti taṃ nidassetvā tena “passāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:3997_5: vutte “imamatthaṃ suṭṭhu upadhārehī”ti āha. Itaro “yathāyaṃ goṇo vūpasantaparissamo
atk-s0508a1:3997_6: paṅkaṭṭhānato bhāraṃ ubbahati, evaṃ mayāpi saṃsārapaṅkato attā uddharitabbo”ti tamevārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:3997_7: katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4005: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano jeṭṭhabhātikassa bharatattherassa santike aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4008: Bhiyyo laddhāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhuraṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4011: Ājānīyaṃ maṃ dhāretha, puttaṃ buddhassa orasa”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4012_0: Tattha bhiyyo laddhāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhuranti “mayhaṃ jātibalavīriyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4012_1: ananucchavikametaṃ yadidaṃ āgatassa bhārassa avahana”nti saṃvegaṃ labhitvā adīno
atk-s0508a1:4012_2: adīnamānaso alīnacitto. “Alīno”ti vā pāṭho, so eva attho. Bhiyyo punappunaṃ bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a1:4012_3: attano dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vahate ubbahati. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā ramaṇīyavihārittherassa gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a1:4015_0: Ehi, nandaka, gacchāmāti āyasmato bharatattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a1:4015_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ manuññadassanaṃ mudusukhasamphassaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4015_2: upāhanadvayaṃ gahetvā gacchanto satthāraṃ caṅkamantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanā
atk-s0508a1:4015_3: upanāmetvā, “abhiruhatu bhagavā upāhanā, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4015_4: āha. Abhiruhi bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṃ upāhanā. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4015_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campānagare gahapatikule nibbatti, bharatotissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4015_6: ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto soṇattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “sopi nāma pabbajī”ti
atk-s0508a1:4015_7: sañjātasaṃvego pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a1:4023: Ito phalaṃ labhissāmi, so me attho samijjhatu.
atk-s0508a1:4026: “Yo pānadhiṃ me adāsi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a1:4035: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4045: Datvāna pānadhiṃ ekaṃ, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4049_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikena nandakattherena heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0508a1:4049_1: aññābyākaraṇe kate “idāni nandakopi arahā jāto, handa mayaṃ ubhopi satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4049_2: gantvā vusitabrahmacariyataṃ nivedessāmāti uppannaṃ parivitakkaṃ nandakattherassa kathento –
atk-s0508a1:4055: So no attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4056_0: Tattha nandakāti ālapanaṃ. Ehīti tassa attano santikakaraṇaṃ. Gacchāmāti tena attanā
atk-s0508a1:4056_1: ca ekajjhaṃ kātabbakiriyāvacanaṃ, upajjhāyassāti sammāsambuddhassa, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0508a1:4056_2: hi samantacakkhunā buddhacakkhunā ca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādīnaṃ yathābhūtavilokanena
atk-s0508a1:4056_3: sadevakassa lokassa vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti visesato upajjhāyoti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0508a1:4056_4: arahati. Yadatthaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “sīhanādaṃ nadissāma, buddhaseṭṭhassa sammukhā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4056_5: āha. Yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāratāya abhītanādabhāvato sīhanādaṃ buddhassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a1:4056_6: tato eva sabbasattuttamatāya seṭṭhassa, buddhānaṃ vā sāvakabuddhādīnaṃ seṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a1:4057_0: Yathā pana sīhanādaṃ naditukāmo, taṃ dassento “yāyā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha yāyāti yadatthaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4057_1: yāya yadatthānuppattiyāti attho. Noti amhākaṃ. Anukampāyāti anuggaṇhanena amhe dvepi
atk-s0508a1:4057_2: pabbājayi pabbājesi. Munīti bhagavā. So no attho anuppattoti so attho sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4057_3: khayabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ no amhehi anuppatto, adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4060_0: Nadanti evaṃ sappaññāti āyasmato bhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4060_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4060_2: viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sumanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4060_3: paripakkaṃ vallikāraphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4060_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gottanāmena bhāradvājotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a1:4060_5: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaputtaṃ labhi. Tassa “kaṇhadinno”ti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4060_6: Tassa viññutaṃ pattakāle “tāta, asukassa nāma ācariyassa santike sippaṃ sikkhitvā
atk-s0508a1:4060_7: ehī”ti taṃ takkasilaṃ pesesi. So gacchanto antarāmagge satthu sāvakaṃ aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4060_8: kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco
atk-s0508a1:4060_9: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4063: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4066_0: Athassa pitā bhāradvājo veḷuvane viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a1:4066_1: pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Atha putto satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4066_2: āgato satthu santike nisinnaṃ pitaraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto “pitāpi kho me pabbajito,
atk-s0508a1:4066_3: kiṃ nu kho tena pabbajjākiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpita”nti vīmaṃsanto khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0508a1:4066_4: taṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmo, “sādhu, kho tumhehi kataṃ pabbajantehi, pabbajjākiccaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4066_5: pana matthakaṃ pāpita”nti pucchi. Bhāradvājo puttassa adhigamaṃ dīpento –
atk-s0508a1:4071: “Satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito;
atk-s0508a1:4072: Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsava”nti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4073_0: Tattha nadantīti yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāravasena abhītanādaṃ nadanti gajjanti. Evanti
atk-s0508a1:4073_4: devaputtamārañca jetvā sabbaso vijitasaṅgāmā nadanti sappaññāti sambandho.
atk-s0508a1:4074_0: Evaṃ vijetabbavijayena sīhanādaṃ dassetvā idāni ārādhetabbasamārādhanena icchitabbasiddhiyā
atk-s0508a1:4074_1: ca taṃ dassetuṃ, “satthā ca pariciṇṇo me”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha satthā ca pariciṇṇo
atk-s0508a1:4074_2: meti mama satthā sammāsambuddho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena mayā pariciṇṇo
atk-s0508a1:4074_3: upāsito, na dhammādhikaraṇaṃ visositoti adhippāyo. Dhammo saṅgho ca pūjitoti navavidhopi
atk-s0508a1:4074_5: ca mayā pūjito mānito. Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsavanti mama puttaṃ anāsavaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4074_6: sabbaso khīṇāsavaṃ disvā dassanahetu ahampi vitto nirāmisāya pītiyā tuṭṭho, tatoyeva
atk-s0508a1:4077_0: Upāsitā sappurisāti āyasmato kaṇhadinnattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4077_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4077_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sobhitaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:4077_3: punnāgapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4077_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā kaṇhadinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4077_5: upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4077_6: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4088: “Bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a1:4089: Na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4091_0: Tattha upāsitāti paricaritā paṭipattipayirupāsanāya payirupāsitā. Sappurisāti santehi
atk-s0508a1:4091_1: sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatā purisā, ariyapuggalā sāriputtattherādayo. Etena purimacakkadvayasampattimattano
atk-s0508a1:4091_2: dasseti. Na hi patirūpadesavāsena vinā sappurisūpanissayo sambhavati. Sutā dhammāti
atk-s0508a1:4091_4: bāhusaccaṃ dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ dasseti. Abhiṇhasoti bahuso na kālena
atk-s0508a1:4091_5: kālaṃ. Idañca padaṃ “upāsitā sappurisā”ti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ. Sutvāna paṭipajjissaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4091_6: añjasaṃ amatogadhanti te dhamme sutvā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇādito pariggahetvā
atk-s0508a1:4091_7: anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā amatogadhaṃ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ taṃsampāpakaṃ añjasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4092_0: Bhavarāgahatassa me satoti bhavarāgena bhavataṇhāya anādimati saṃsāre hatassa upaddutassa
atk-s0508a1:4092_1: mama sato samānassa, aggamaggena vā hatabhavarāgassa. Bhavarāgo puna me na vijjatīti
atk-s0508a1:4092_2: tato eva puna idāni bhavarāgo me natthi. Na cāhu na me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi
atk-s0508a1:4092_3: vijjatīti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakāle sekkhakāle ca me bhavarāgo ahosi, aggamaggappattito
atk-s0508a1:4092_4: pana paṭṭhāya na cāhu na ca ahosi, āyatimpi na me bhavissati, etarahi adhunāpi na
atk-s0508a1:4092_5: ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati, pahīnoti attho. Bhavarāgavacaneneva cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya
atk-s0508a1:4092_6: mānādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a1:4097_0: Yato ahaṃ pabbajitoti āyasmato migasirattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4097_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4097_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kusaṭṭhakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4097_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a1:4097_4: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā migasiranakkhattena jātattā migasiroti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4097_5: brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhi, yaṃ parijappetvā
atk-s0508a1:4097_6: tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukaṭṭhāne nibbatto”ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a1:4098_0: So gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ vijjaṃ nissāya lokena
atk-s0508a1:4098_1: sakkato garukato lābhī hutvā vicaranto sāvatthiṃ upagato satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0508a1:4098_2: ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento – “ahaṃ, bho gotama, matānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0508a1:4098_3: “kathaṃ pana tvaṃ jānāsī”ti vutte, “chavasīsāni āharāpetvā mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena
atk-s0508a1:4098_4: sīsaṃ ākoṭento nirayādikaṃ tehi tehi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī”ti kathesi. Athassa bhagavā
atk-s0508a1:4098_5: parinibbutassa bhikkhuno sīsakapālaṃ āharāpetvā, “kathehi tāva tassa gatiṃ, yassidaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4098_6: sīsakapāla”nti āha. So taṃ kapālaṃ mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā neva antaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4098_7: na koṭiṃ passati. Atha satthārā, “na sakkosi paribbājakā”ti vutte, “upaparikkhissāmi
atk-s0508a1:4098_8: tāvā”ti vatvā punappunaṃ parivattentopi na passateva. Bāhirakamantena hi khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0508a1:4098_9: gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati, athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci. So lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto
atk-s0508a1:4098_10: aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “kilamasi paribbājakā”ti āha. So “āma, kilamāmi, na imassa gatiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4098_11: jānāmi, tumhe pana jānāthā”ti. “Ahaṃ etaṃ jānāmi, ito uttaritarampi jānāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0508a1:4098_12: “nibbānaṃ gato so”ti āha. Paribbājako “imaṃ vijjaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti āha. “Tena hi
atk-s0508a1:4098_13: pabbajā”ti vatvā taṃ pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ samathakammaṭṭhāne niyojetvā jhānābhiññāsu
atk-s0508a1:4098_14: patiṭṭhitassa vipassanāya kammaṃ upadisi. So vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:4110: Akuppā me vimuttīti, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4111_0: Tattha yato ahaṃ pabbajito, sammāsambuddhasāsaneti yato pabhuti ahaṃ pabbajito buddhassa
atk-s0508a1:4111_1: bhagavato sāsane, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. Vimuccamāno uggacchinti saṃkilesapakkhato
atk-s0508a1:4111_2: paṭhamaṃ tāva samathavipassanāhi vimuccamāno vodānadhammasavanena uṭṭhahiṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4111_3: uggacchanto kāmadhātuṃ upaccagaṃ anāgāmimaggena accantameva kāmadhātuṃ atikkamiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4112_0: Brahmuno pekkhamānassa, tato cittaṃ vimucci meti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhūtattā
atk-s0508a1:4112_1: seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahākaruṇāyogena “ayaṃ kulaputto mama sāsane
atk-s0508a1:4112_2: pabbajitvā kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjatī”ti pekkhantassa tato anāgāmimaggādhigamato pacchā
atk-s0508a1:4112_3: aggamaggādhigamena mama cittaṃ sabbasaṃkilesato accantameva mucci. Akuppā me vimuttīti,
atk-s0508a1:4112_4: sabbasaṃyojanakkhayāti tathāvimuttacittattā eva sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayā parikkhayā
atk-s0508a1:4112_5: iti evaṃ akuppā me vimuttīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4115_0: Aniccāni gahakānīti āyasmato sivakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4115_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4115_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4115_3: pattaṃ ādāya kummāsassa pūretvā adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4115_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sivakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4115_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4115_6: pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4115_7: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4117: Rittakaṃ pattaṃ disvāna, kummāsaṃ pūrayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4127: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā ca vidālitā;
atk-s0508a1:4128: Vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ, idheva vidhamissatī”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4129_0: Tattha aniccāni gahakāni, tattha tattha punappunanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave punappunaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4129_1: nibbattamānāni gahakāni attabhāvagehāni na nibbāni anavaṭṭhitāni ittarāni parittakālāni.
atk-s0508a1:4129_2: Gahakāraṃ gavesantoti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0508a1:4129_3: ettakaṃ kālaṃ anuvicarinti adhippāyo. Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa
atk-s0508a1:4129_4: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
atk-s0508a1:4129_5: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā taṃ gavesanto vicarinti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4130_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosīti idāni pana yena so sakkā daṭṭhuṃ, tena ariyamaggañāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0508a1:4130_1: gahakāraka diṭṭho asi. Puna gehanti puna imasmiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4130_2: mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi. Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā
atk-s0508a1:4130_3: mayā bhaggā. Thūṇikā ca vidālitāti idāni tayā kātabbassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātā
atk-s0508a1:4130_4: kaṇṇikā ca bhinnā. Vimariyādikataṃ cittanti mama cittaṃ vigatantaṃ kataṃ, āyatiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4130_5: anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditaṃ. Tato eva idheva vidhamissati imasmiṃyeva bhave viddhaṃsissati,
atk-s0508a1:4133_0: Arahaṃ sugatoti āyasmato upavāṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:4133_1: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa
atk-s0508a1:4133_3: thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṃ katvā pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4133_4: akāsi. Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4133_5: ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse dhārento cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. So taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4133_6: disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4133_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā upavāṇoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4133_8: jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a1:4133_9: kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4153: Manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-s0508a1:4161: Manussā devanāgā ca, buddhapūjaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-s0508a1:4164: “Sabbaṃ maṇimayaṃ thūpaṃ, akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4169: Manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a1:4171: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a1:4177: Manussā devanāgā ca, garuḷā ca kumbhaṇḍakā.
atk-s0508a1:4179: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a1:4185: Manujā devatā nāgā, kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a1:4188: “Vediyo satta katvāna, dhajaṃ chattaṃ akaṃsu te;
atk-s0508a1:4191: Rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hoti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a1:4194: “Tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṃ pūjenti mānusā;
atk-s0508a1:4195: Na te thūpaṃ āruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te.
atk-s0508a1:4197: Dhajaṃ vā pupphadāmaṃ vā, abhiropeti uttariṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4198: “Na te passanti taṃ yakkhaṃ, dāmaṃ passanti gacchato;
atk-s0508a1:4199: Evaṃ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4200: “Viruddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane;
atk-s0508a1:4203: Āmoditaṃ janaṃ disvā, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a1:4205: Imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṃ kubbaṃ na tappare.
atk-s0508a1:4211: Vāteritaṃ dhajaṃ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janesahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4213: Taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā, vipākaṃ pucchahaṃ dhaje.
atk-s0508a1:4229: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4236: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a1:4239: Tīṇi yojanāni sāmantā, ussīyanti dhajā sadā.
atk-s0508a1:4243_0: Athāyasmā upavāṇo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho
atk-s0508a1:4243_1: uppajji. Therassa ca gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati. So
atk-s0508a1:4243_2: theraṃ catūhi paccayehi pavedesi. Athāyasmā upavāṇo nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa
atk-s0508a1:4243_3: brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ upagacchi. Brāhmaṇo “kenaci aññena payojanena thero āgato”ti
atk-s0508a1:4243_4: ñatvā, “vadeyyātha, bhante, kenattho”ti āha. Thero tassa brāhmaṇassa payojanaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a1:4246: Sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0508a1:4249: Apacitopaceyyānaṃ, tassa icchāmi hātave”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4250_0: Tassattho – yo imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi
atk-s0508a1:4250_1: ca brahmehi pūjito, sakkareyyānaṃ sakkātabbehi bimbisārakosalarājādīhi sakkato, apaceyyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4250_2: apacāyitabbehi mahesīhi khīṇāsavehi apacito, kilesehi ārakattādinā arahaṃ, sobhanagamanādinā
atk-s0508a1:4250_3: sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṃ satthā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā,
atk-s0508a1:4250_4: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṃ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa, uṇhodakaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4250_5: atthi, tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṃ taṃ hātave upanetuṃ icchāmīti. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a1:4250_6: uṇhodakaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vātārahañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi. Tena ca satthu rogo
atk-s0508a1:4253_0: Diṭṭhā mayāti āyasmato isidinnattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4253_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4253_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bījaniṃ gahetvā bodhiyā pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4253_3: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4253_4: isidinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu candanamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4253_5: pasannamānaso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
atk-s0508a1:4255: “Diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā;
atk-s0508a1:4256: Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā.
atk-s0508a1:4258: “Addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṃ, kāmā aniccā iti cāpi āhu;
atk-s0508a1:4259: Rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettuṃ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṃ dhanañcā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4261_0: Tattha diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānāti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharā
atk-s0508a1:4261_1: upāsakā mayā diṭṭhā, pariyattidhammadharattā eva “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4261_2: kāmesu ādīnavapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsamānā, sayaṃ pana sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu,
atk-s0508a1:4261_3: puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhāti sārattā hutvā bahalarāgarattā maṇīsu kuṇḍalesu ca,
atk-s0508a1:4261_4: maṇicitesu vā kuṇḍalesu, puttesu puttadhītāsu dāresu ca adhigatasnehā, aññaṃ bhaṇantā
atk-s0508a1:4262_0: Yatoti yasmā te upāsakā sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca apekkhavanto,
atk-s0508a1:4262_1: tasmā idha imasmiṃ buddhasāsane dhammaṃ yāthāvato addhā ekaṃsena na jānanti. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4262_2: bhūtā ca “kāmā aniccā”iti cāpi āhu ahosi, sattapakati vicittasabhāvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a1:4262_3: Rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettunti tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ yasmā rāgaṃ chettuṃ samucchindituṃ
atk-s0508a1:4262_4: tādisaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ natthi, tasmā tena kāraṇena sitā taṇhāvasena nissitā puttadāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4262_5: dhanañca allīnā na vissajjentīti sabbametaṃ devatā taṃyeva upāsakaṃ uddissa aññāpadesena
atk-s0508a1:4262_6: kathesi. Taṃ sutvā upāsako saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4268: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto imā eva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a1:4271_0: Devo cāti āyasmato sambulakaccānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4271_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4271_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sataraṃsiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a1:4271_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tālaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4271_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā “sambulo”ti
atk-s0508a1:4272_0: So vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā himavantasamīpe
atk-s0508a1:4272_1: bheravāya nāma pabbataguhāyaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto viharati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4272_2: mahā akālamegho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo thanento gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārento
atk-s0508a1:4272_3: gaḷagaḷāyanto uṭṭhahitvā vassituṃ ārabhi, asaniyo phaliṃsu. Taṃ saddaṃ sutvā acchataracchuvanamahiṃsahatthiādayo
atk-s0508a1:4272_4: bhītatasitā bhītaravaṃ viraviṃsu. Thero pana āraddhavipassanattā kāye jīvite ca nirapekkho
atk-s0508a1:4272_5: vigatalomahaṃso taṃ acintento vipassanāyameva kammaṃ karonto ghammāpagamena utusappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a1:4272_6: samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā saha abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4280: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4284: Tassa mayhaṃ ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
atk-s0508a1:4285: Natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā.
atk-s0508a1:4287: “Dhammatā mamesā yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile;
atk-s0508a1:4288: Viharato natthi bhayaṃ vā, chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4290_0: Tattha devo ca vassati, devo ca gaḷagaḷāyatīti devo megho vassati ca, “gaḷagaḷā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4290_1: ca karonto gajjatīti attho. Gajjantassa hi anukaraṇametaṃ. Ekako cāhaṃ bherave bile
atk-s0508a1:4290_2: viharāmīti ahañca ekako asahāyo sappaṭibhayāyaṃ pabbataguhāyaṃ vasāmi, tassa mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4290_3: evaṃbhūtassa me sato natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vāti cittutrāsasaññitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4290_4: bhayaṃ vā taṃnimittakaṃ sarīrassa chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃsanamattaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0508a1:4291_0: Kasmāti tattha kāraṇamāha “dhammatā mamesā”ti. Apariññātavatthukassa hi tattha appahīnacchandarāgatāya
atk-s0508a1:4291_1: bhayādinā bhavitabbaṃ, mayā pana sabbaso tattha pariññātaṃ, tattha ca chandarāgo
atk-s0508a1:4291_2: samucchinno, tasmā bhayādīnaṃ abhāvo dhammatā mamesā mama dhammasabhāvo esoti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4294_0: Kassa selūpamaṃ cittanti āyasmato nitakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4294_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0508a1:4294_2: ārāmagopako hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4294_3: nāḷikeraphalaṃ dātukāmo ahosi. Satthā taṃ anuggaṇhanto ākāseyeva ṭhatvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a1:4294_4: So taṃ datvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a1:4294_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā nitakoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a1:4294_6: viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4294_7: gahetvā araññe viharanto ghaṭento arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4308_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharante padhānapariggāhako
atk-s0508a1:4308_1: thero taṃ āraññāyatanaṃ gantvā tattha vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariggaṇhanatthaṃ “kassa
atk-s0508a1:4309_0: 191. Tattha kassa selūpamaṃ cittaṃ, ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatīti imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu
atk-s0508a1:4309_1: kassa bhikkhuno cittaṃ aggaphalādhigamena ekaghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4309_2: abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyā ca ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānukampati na vedhati.
atk-s0508a1:4309_3: Idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ “viratta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha virattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4309_4: rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu
atk-s0508a1:4309_5: virattaṃ, tattha sabbaso samucchinnarāganti attho. Kuppanīyeti paṭighaṭṭhānīye, sabbasmimpi
atk-s0508a1:4309_6: āghātavatthusmiṃ. Na kuppatīti na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati. Yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4309_7: cittanti yassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ mano evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvena bhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4309_8: kuto taṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ puggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati,
atk-s0508a1:4310: 192. Evaṃ aniyamavasena pucchitamatthaṃ nitakatthero attūpanāyikaṃ katvā vissajjento “mama selūpamaṃ citta”ntiādinā dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a1:4313_0: Na tāva supituṃ hotīti āyasmato soṇassa poṭiriyaputtassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4313_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro sikhissa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4313_2: satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kurañjiyaphalaṃ satthuno adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4313_3: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ poṭiriyassa nāma gāmabhojakassa
atk-s0508a1:4313_4: putto hutvā nibbatti, soṇotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto bhaddiyassa sākiyarañño
atk-s0508a1:4313_5: senāpati ahosi. Atha bhaddiyarāje heṭṭhā vuttanayena pabbajite, senāpati “rājāpi
atk-s0508a1:4313_6: nāma pabbaji, kiṃ mayhaṃ gharāvāsenā”ti pabbaji? Pabbajitvā pana niddārāmo viharati,
atk-s0508a1:4313_7: na bhāvanamanuyuñjati. Taṃ bhagavā anupiyāyaṃ ambavane viharanto attano obhāsaṃ pharāpetvā
atk-s0508a1:4313_8: tenassa satiṃ janetvā imāya gāthāya taṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:4319: Saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4320_0: Tattha na tāva supituṃ hoti, ratti nakkhattamālinīti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṃ navamaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4320_1: khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa viññujātikassa yāva na arahattaṃ hatthagataṃ hoti, tāva
atk-s0508a1:4320_2: ayaṃ nakkhattamālinī ratti supituṃ niddāyituṃ na hoti, supanassa kālo na hoti. Apica
atk-s0508a1:4320_3: kho paṭijaggitumevesā, ratti hoti vijānatāti esā ratti nāma manussānaṃ migapakkhīnañca
atk-s0508a1:4320_4: niddūpagamanena visesato nissaddavelābhūtā paṭipattiṃ attani sañjaggituṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuñjitumeva
atk-s0508a1:4321_0: Taṃ sutvā soṇo saṃviggataramānaso hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:4321_1: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto “hatthikkhandhova patita”nti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a1:4321_2: avapatitanti avamukhaṃ patitaṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ adhomukhaṃ patitaṃ. Kuñjaro ce anukkameti
atk-s0508a1:4321_3: kuñjaro anukkameyya ce. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadāhaṃ hatthimāruhitvā saṅgāmaṃ paviṭṭho
atk-s0508a1:4321_4: hatthikkhandhato patito, tadāhaṃ saṅgāme tena hatthinā maddito mato ahosiṃ ce, taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4321_5: me maraṇaṃ seyyo, yañce idāni kilesehi parājito jīveyyaṃ, taṃ na seyyoti. Imaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4321_6: vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4326: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4329: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “satthārā vuttaṃ, attanā vutta”nti ubhayañhi gāthaṃ “hatthikkhandhāvapatita”ntiādinā paccudāhāsi. Tena idameva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:4332_0: Pañca kāmaguṇe hitvāti āyasmato nisabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4332_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4332_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a1:4332_3: kapitthaphalamadāsi. So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4332_4: koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvā nisabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sākiyakoliyānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4332_5: saṅgāme buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a1:4338: So arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyabhikkhū pamādavihārena kālaṃ vītināmente disvā te ovadanto –
atk-s0508a1:4343_1: manorame rūpādike pañca kāmaguṇe kāmakoṭṭhāse hitvā pahāya pariccajitvā kammaphalasaddhāya
atk-s0508a1:4343_2: ratanattayasaddhāya ca vasena gharā gharabandhanato nikkhamma nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4343_3: upagato viññujātiko pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro
atk-s0508a1:4343_4: bhave bhaveyyāti. Evaṃ te bhikkhū ovaditvā “ayaṃ pare eva saññāpento viharati, “sayaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4343_5: pana akārako’ti mā cintayitthā”ti tesaṃ attano paṭipannabhāvaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a1:4347_0: Dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. Tattha nābhinandāmi maraṇanti maraṇaṃ na abhikaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0508a1:4347_1: Nābhinandāmi jīvitanti idaṃ pana tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā nābhinandāmi jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4347_2: tasmā nābhinandāmi maraṇanti. Yo hi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇāya kilesābhisaṅkhāre ācinoti
atk-s0508a1:4347_3: upacinoti, so punabbhavābhinibbattiṃ abhinandanto nāntariyakatāya attano maraṇampi
atk-s0508a1:4347_4: abhinandati nāma kāraṇassa appahīnattā, khīṇāsavo pana sabbaso ācayagāmidhamme pahāya
atk-s0508a1:4347_5: apacayagāmidhamme patiṭṭhito pariññātavatthuko sabbaso jīvitaṃ anabhinandanto maraṇampi
atk-s0508a1:4347_6: anabhinandati nāma kāraṇassa eva suppahīnattā. Tenāha – “nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhinandāmi
atk-s0508a1:4347_7: jīvita”nti. Yadi evaṃ khīṇāsavassa parinibbānābhikaṅkhā, yāva parinibbānā avaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0508a1:4347_8: kathanti āha “kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, sampajāno patissato”ti, kilesaparinibbāne siddhe
atk-s0508a1:4347_9: satipaññāvepullappattiyā sato sampajāno kevalaṃ khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4347_10: taṃ udikkhamāno āgamayamāno viharāmi, na pana me maraṇe jīvite vā abhinandanā atthi
atk-s0508a1:4350_0: Ambapallavasaṅkāsanti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4350_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4350_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a1:4350_3: kosambaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4350_4: kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbattitvā usabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu
atk-s0508a1:4350_5: ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a1:4350_6: samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā divā saṅgaṇikārāmo sakalarattiṃ niddāyamāno vītināmeti. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4350_7: muṭṭhassati asampajāno niddaṃ okkanto supine kesamassuṃ ohāretvā ambapallavavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4350_8: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā hatthigīvāyaṃ nisīditvā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ tattheva manusse
atk-s0508a1:4350_9: sampatte disvā lajjāya hatthikkhandhato oruyha attānaṃ disvā paṭibuddho, “īdisaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4350_10: nāma supinaṃ muṭṭhassatinā asampajānena niddāyamānena mayā diṭṭha”nti uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0508a1:4350_11: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4353: “Ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā;
atk-s0508a1:4356: Atha thero yathādiṭṭhaṃ supinaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā arahattassa adhigatattā tasseva supinassa kittanavasena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4362: Sohaṃ ditto tadā santo, patto me āsavakkhayo”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a1:4363_0: Tattha ambapallavasaṅkāsaṃ, aṃse katvāna cīvaranti ambapallavākāraṃ pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4363_1: cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā. Gāmanti attano rājadhāniṃ hatthikkhandhe
atk-s0508a1:4363_2: nisinno piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ, paviṭṭhamattova mahājanena olokiyamāno hatthikkhandhato
atk-s0508a1:4363_3: oruyha ṭhito paṭibujjhiṃ, pabuddhova saṃvegaṃ alabhiṃ tadā “muṭṭhassati asampajāno
atk-s0508a1:4363_4: hutvā niddāyokkamanena etaṃ jāta”nti. Apare pana “rājāva hutvā rattibhāge evarūpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4363_5: supinaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā hatthikkhandhaṃ āruyha nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto taṃ
atk-s0508a1:4363_6: supinaṃ saritvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha saṃvegaṃ labhitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4363_7: arahattaṃ patvā udānaṃ udānento imā gāthā abhāsī”ti vadanti. Dittoti tasmiṃ rājakāle
atk-s0508a1:4366_0: Ayamiti kappaṭoti āyasmato kappaṭakurattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4366_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4366_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4366_3: rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ketakapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a1:4366_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ duggatakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a1:4366_5: yāva vayappatti, tāva aññaṃ upāyaṃ ajānanto kappaṭakhaṇḍanivāsano sarāvahattho tattha
atk-s0508a1:4366_6: tattha kuraṃ pariyesanto vicari, tena kappaṭakurotveva paññāyittha. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a1:4366_7: tiṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento ekadivasaṃ tiṇalāvanatthaṃ araññaṃ gato tattha
atk-s0508a1:4366_8: aññataraṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi. Tassa thero dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4366_9: kathesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho “kiṃ me imāya kicchajīvikāyā”ti pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a1:4366_10: attano nivatthakappaṭacoḷaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nikkhipi. Yadā cassa anabhirati uppajjati,
atk-s0508a1:4366_11: tadā taṃ kappaṭaṃ olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati, saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi. Evaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a1:4366_12: sattakkhattuṃ uppabbaji. Tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4366_13: kappaṭakuro bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṃ parisapariyante nisinno niddāyati, taṃ bhagavā codento –
atk-s0508a1:4371: “Mā kho tvaṃ kappaṭa pacālesi, mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessaṃ;
atk-s0508a1:4372: Na hi tvaṃ kappaṭa mattamaññāsi, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4374_0: Tattha ayamiti kappaṭo kappaṭakuroti kappaṭakuro bhikkhu “ayaṃ mama kappaṭo, imaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4374_1: paridahitvā yathā tathā jīvāmī”ti evaṃ uppannamicchāvitakko acchāya atibharitāya
atk-s0508a1:4374_2: amataghaṭikāyaṃ mama amataghaṭe tahaṃ tahaṃ vassante “amatamadhigataṃ ahamanusāsāmi,
atk-s0508a1:4374_3: ahaṃ dhammaṃ desemi”. “Andhībhūtasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, āhañchaṃ amatadundubhi”ntiādinā ghosetvā
atk-s0508a1:4374_4: mayā dhammāmate pavassiyamāne katapadaṃ jhānāni ocetuṃ lokiyalokuttarajjhānāni upacetuṃ
atk-s0508a1:4374_5: bhāvetuṃ katapadaṃ kaṭamaggavihitabhāvanāmaggaṃ idaṃ mama sāsanaṃ, tathāpi dhammakaṭamatto
atk-s0508a1:4374_6: mama sāsanadhammato ukkaṇṭhacitto apagatamānaso kappaṭakuroti taṃ codetvā punapissa
atk-s0508a1:4374_7: sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya pamādavihāraṃ dassento “mā kho tvaṃ, kappaṭa, pacālesī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a1:4375_0: Tattha mā kho tvaṃ, kappaṭa, pacālesīti tvaṃ, kappaṭakura, “mama dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a1:4375_1: nisīditvā mā kho pacālesi mā pacalāhi mā niddaṃ upagacchi. Mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessanti
atk-s0508a1:4375_2: taṃ niddāyamānaṃ upakaṇṇamhi kaṇṇasamīpe desanāhatthena ahaṃ mā patāḷessaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0508a1:4375_3: ito paraṃ kilesappahānāya ahaṃ taṃ na ovadeyyaṃ, tathā paṭipajjāhīti attho. Na hi
atk-s0508a1:4375_4: tvaṃ, kappaṭa, mattamaññāsīti tvaṃ, kappaṭa, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno mattaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4375_5: pamāṇaṃ na vā maññasi, “ayamatidullabho khaṇo paṭiladdho, so mā upajjhagā”ti ettakampi
atk-s0508a1:4375_6: na jānāsi, passa yāva ca te aparaddhanti codesi.
atk-s0508a1:4376_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā dvīhi gāthāhi gāḷhaṃ taṃ niggayha codanāya katāya aṭṭhivedhaviddho
atk-s0508a1:4376_1: viya caṇḍagajo maggaṃ otaranto viya ca sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a1:4384: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthārā vuttagāthādvayameva attano arahattādhigamanassa aṅkusabhūtanti paccudāhāsi. Tenassa tadeva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a1:4389_0: Aho buddhā aho dhammāti āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4389_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a1:4389_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. “Kulagehe”ti pana aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4389_3: vuttaṃ. So satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4389_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tadanurūpāni
atk-s0508a1:4389_5: puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato kāle samaṇadhammaṃ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4389_6: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva
atk-s0508a1:4389_7: pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatāpi gabbhasaṇṭhitampi
atk-s0508a1:4389_8: ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā. Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4389_9: disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu. So “assamaṇī”ti āha. Puna dasabalaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a1:4389_10: Satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi. Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4389_11: pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya vinicchinanto “pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4389_12: āha. Satthā “suvinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇa”nti therassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a1:4390_0: Sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Taṃ rājā pasenadikosalo posesi. “Kassapo”ti
atk-s0508a1:4390_1: cassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Kumārakāle
atk-s0508a1:4390_2: pabbajitattā bhagavatā “kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa
atk-s0508a1:4391_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṃ karoti, buddhavacanañca uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a1:4391_1: Atha tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbatto
atk-s0508a1:4391_2: mahābrahmā “vipassanāya mukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphalappattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti pañcadasa
atk-s0508a1:4391_3: pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa therassa “ime pañhe satthāraṃ puccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0508a1:4391_4: ācikkhitvā gato. So te pañhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Bhagavāpissa byākāsi. Thero satthārā
atk-s0508a1:4391_5: kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4403: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhāna patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4411: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a1:4421: Sākhena cattā me mātā, nigrodhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a1:4425: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhamhi jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4426: “Tenānusiṭṭhā migayūthapena, ahañca mātā ca tathetare ca;
atk-s0508a1:4427: Āgamma rammaṃ tusitādhivāsaṃ, gatā pavāsaṃ sagharaṃ yatheva.
atk-s0508a1:4433: So avoca vināsetha, pāpikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ imaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4443: Arahattaṃ pana patvā cittakathikabhāvena satthārā etadagge ṭhapito attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā ratanattayaguṇavibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a1:4445: “Aho buddhā aho dhammā, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a1:4450: Jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4451_0: Tattha ahoti acchariyatthe nipāto. Buddhāti sabbaññubuddhā, gāravavasena bahuvacanaṃ,
atk-s0508a1:4451_1: aho acchariyā sambuddhāti attho. Dhammāti pariyattidhammena saddhiṃ nava lokuttaradhammā.
atk-s0508a1:4451_2: Aho no satthu sampadāti amhākaṃ satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo. Yatthāti yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a1:4451_3: satthari brahmacariyavāsena. Etādisaṃ dhammaṃ, sāvako sacchikāhitīti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4451_5: dhammaṃ sāvakopi nāma sacchikarissati, tasmā evaṃvidhaguṇavisesādhigamahetubhūtā
atk-s0508a1:4451_6: aho acchariyā buddhā bhagavanto, acchariyā dhammaguṇā, acchariyā amhākaṃ satthu sampattiyoti
atk-s0508a1:4451_7: ratanattayassa guṇādhimuttiṃ pavedesīti. Dhammasampattikittaneneva hi saṅghasuppaṭipatti kittitā hotīti.
atk-s0508a1:4452_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇavasena dassitaṃ dhammassa sacchikiriyaṃ idāni attupanāyikaṃ katvā dassento
atk-s0508a1:4452_1: “asaṅkheyyesū”ti gāthamāha. Tattha asaṅkheyyesūti gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattesu mahākappesu.
atk-s0508a1:4452_2: Sakkāyāti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Te hi paramatthato vijjamānadhammasamūhatāya “sakkāyā”ti
atk-s0508a1:4452_3: vuccanti. Ahūti nivattanūpāyassa anadhigatattā anapagatā ahesuṃ. Tesamayaṃ pacchimako
atk-s0508a1:4452_4: carimoyaṃ samussayoti yasmā ayaṃ sabbapacchimako, tato eva carimo, tasmā jātimaraṇasahito
atk-s0508a1:4452_5: khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito saṃsāro idāni āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0508a1:4455_0: Yo have daharo bhikkhūti āyasmato dhammapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a1:4455_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a1:4455_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0508a1:4455_3: pasannamānaso pilakkhaphalamadāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a1:4455_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammapāloti
atk-s0508a1:4455_5: laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge
atk-s0508a1:4455_6: ekasmiṃ vihāre aññataraṃ theraṃ disvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a1:4455_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4461_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ vihāre dve
atk-s0508a1:4461_1: sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a1:4461_2: hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a1:4464: Jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a1:4467: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. – imā dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a1:4468_0: Tattha yoti aniyamavacanaṃ. Haveti daḷhatthe nipāto. Daharoti taruṇo. Bhikkhatīti
atk-s0508a1:4468_1: bhikkhu. Yuñjatīti ghaṭati vāyamati. Jāgaroti jāgaraṇadhammasamannāgato. Suttesūti
atk-s0508a1:4468_2: supantesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yo bhikkhu daharova samāno taruṇo “tathāhaṃ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle
atk-s0508a1:4468_3: jānissāmī”ti acintetvā buddhānaṃ sāsane appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjati samathavipassanābhāvanāya
atk-s0508a1:4468_4: yogaṃ karoti, so suttesu avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0508a1:4468_5: jāgaro, tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ, yasmā
atk-s0508a1:4468_6: ca etadevaṃ, tasmā saddhañca “atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”tiādinayappavattaṃ kammaphalasaddhañca,
atk-s0508a1:4468_8: bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evaṃ pavattaratanattayappasādañca,
atk-s0508a1:4468_10: dhammojapaññāya samannāgato bhikkhu buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ anussaranto
atk-s0508a1:4468_11: ādittampi attano sīsaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā anuyuñjetha, tattha anuyogaṃ ātappaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a1:4471_0: Kassindriyāni samathaṅgatānīti āyasmato brahmālittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a1:4471_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a1:4471_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a1:4471_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā pādaphalaṃ adāsi. Satthā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0508a1:4471_4: vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a1:4471_5: kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brahmālīti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a1:4471_6: codiyamāno saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena buddhasāsane
atk-s0508a1:4471_7: pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā
atk-s0508a1:4471_8: nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a1:4477: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ padhānapariggāhakena therena tasmiṃ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṃ padhānānuyogaṃ pariggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a1:4480: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino.
atk-s0508a1:4483: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi mayhaṃ pihayanti tādino”ti. –
atk-s0508a1:4485_0: Tassattho – imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu bhikkhūsu kassa bhikkhuno therassa vā
atk-s0508a1:4485_1: navassa vā majjhimassa vā chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni
atk-s0508a1:4485_2: samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni. Kassa navavidhampi mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā
atk-s0508a1:4485_3: pahīnamānassa catunnampi āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā
